T06sambhu:10: samāhitā bhūmiḥ samāsata uddeśato ’pi, tadvyavasthānato ’pi, manasikāraprabhedato ’pi, nimittaprabhedato ’pi, sūtrāntasaṃgrahato ’pi veditavyā.
T06sambhu:12: samāsataḥ samāhitā bhūmiś caturvidhā, tadyathā dhyānaṃ vimokṣaḥ samādhiḥ samāpattiś ca.
T06sambhu:15: vivekajaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram, samādhijam avitarkam avicāram, niṣprītikam, upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ ca.
T06sambhu:19: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ.
T06sambhu:20: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ.
T06sambhu:21: ākāśānantyāyatanam … vijñānānantyāyatanam … ākiṃcanyāyatanam … naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam … saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīty aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ.
T06sambhu:34: punar ārya eva samādhiḥ sopaniṣat sapariṣkāraḥ.
T06sambhu:36: punaḥ śaikṣaḥ samādhiḥ, aśaikṣaḥ samādhiḥ, naiva śaikṣo nāśaikṣaḥ samādhiḥ.
T06sambhu:38: pañca darśanasamāpattayaḥ, aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanasamāpattayaḥ, daśa kṛtsnāyatanasamāpattayaḥ, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, asaṃjñāsamāpattiḥ, nirodhasamāpattiś
T06sambhu:40: H 63b4; C 329a4 (2.0.1) kasmāt punar eṣaiva samāhitā bhūmiḥ, na punar yāpi kāmadhātau cittaikāgratā?
T06sambhu:41: yasmād eṣa samādhir avipratisāraprāmodyaprītiprasrabdhisukhābhinirhṛtaḥ, na tu kāmāvacaraḥ.
T06sambhu:42: na ca punar nāsti kāmadhātau samyagdharmopanidhyānam.
T06sambhu:43: H 63b4; C 329a7 (2.1.0) tatra prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pravivekaprītir ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:44: tāṃ sākṣātkṛtya viharataḥ pañca dharmāḥ prahīyante, tadyathā kāmopasaṃhitaṃ saumanasyam, kāmopasaṃhitaṃ daurmanasyam, akuśalopasaṃhitaṃ saumanasyam, akuśalopasaṃhitaṃ daurmanasyam, akuśalopasaṃhitā copekṣā.
T06sambhu:46: prāmodyam, prītiḥ, prasrabdhiḥ, sukham, samādhiś ca.
T06sambhu:48: pratilabhyamānān pratilabdhān upabhujyamānāṃś ca pañca kāmaguṇān pratītya, dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūtāṃś catān evānusmarato yat saumanasyam.
T06sambhu:50: tān eva pañca kāmaguṇān alabhamānasya tadupabhogaṃ vā punar alabhamānasya labdhānāṃ vā hāniṃ vigamaṃ vināśaṃ pratītya yad daurmanasyam.
T06sambhu:52: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena prāṇātipātiko bhavati yāvan mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ.
T06sambhu:54: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyena prāṇātipātiko bhavati yāvan mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ.
T06sambhu:56: yathāpīhaikatyo rājā vā bhavati rājamātro vā yo vā yasyādhipatir gurur vā gurusthānīyo vā, sa ca svayaṃ prāṇātipātikaṃ pāpaṃ na kartukāmo bhavati, ājñāpuruṣais tu kriyamāṇam adhyupekṣate, na prativārayati, na vinaye sthāpayati, tadadhyupekṣayā ca tasya karmaṇaḥ kriyā bhavati, sa ca tat pratisaṃvedayate karma, na parokṣo bhavati;
T06sambhu:58: akuśale ca pracāre vartamānasya yāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā.
T06sambhu:60: ādiśuddhasya saṃbhārabhūmiṃ pariśuddhāṃ vyavalokayato yad avipratisārapūrvikāttamanaskatā prāmodyaṃ saumanasyaṃ cittakalyatā.
T06sambhu:62: yaḥ samyakprayogapūrvako harṣaḥ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ cittakalyatā.
T06sambhu:67: yatpakṣyaṃ hi tad dauṣṭhulyam apagatam, tebhya upakleśebhyo vimuktiḥ.
T06sambhu:69: samyag ālambanam upanidhyāyato yac cetasa aikāgryam.
T06sambhu:70: H 64a3; C 329b2 (2.1.2.6.1) anāsrave prayoge bhagavān pūrvaṃ samādhim āha paścād vimuktim, niṣpannasya samādher vaśena kevalaṃ kleśebhyaś cittavimocanatām
T06sambhu:71: H 64a4; C 329b4 (2.1.2.6.2) sāsrave tu prayoge pūrvaṃ vimuktim āha paścāt samādhim, prayoganiṣṭhāmanasikāraphalatvāt kleśaprahāṇasya maulasamādhipratilambhatām
T06sambhu:72: H 64a4; C 329b6 (2.1.2.6.3) yugapat samādhiṃ ca vimuktiṃ cāha, tadyathā tasminn eva prayoganiṣṭhe manasikāre yaḥ samādhir vimuktisahagatas tadanyeṣu
T06sambhu:73: H 64a5; C 329b9 (2.2.0) tatra pañca nivaraṇāni dhyānasamāpattyāvaraṇāni yāni dhyānasamāpattikāla āvaraṇaṃ kurvanti:
T06sambhu:76: śubhanimittam anusarataḥ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣu yā draṣṭukāmatā yāvat spraṣṭukāmatā, pūrvānubhūtān vā samanusmarato yā vitarkayitukāmatā.
T06sambhu:78: sabrahmacāribhyaś codanām āgamyānyatamānyatamaṃ vā kaṃcid apakāraṃ pratighanimittam anusmarato yaś cetasa āghātaḥ, apakāraṃ vā kartukāmasya tad eva pratighanimittaṃ bahulam anuvitarkayato ’nuvicārayato yaś cetasa āghātaḥ.
T06sambhu:80: anyatamānyatamāṃ vā śīlādivipattim āgamyendriyair aguptadvāratāṃ vāmātrābhojitāṃ vājāgarikānuyuktatāṃ vāsaṃprajānavihāritāṃ vā, prahāṇe prayuktasya yat sarvakleśotpattyanukūlaṃ kāyacittastaimityaṃ kāyacittākarmaṇyatā.
T06sambhu:83: H 64a7; C 329b22 (2.2.1.3.3) styānaṃ kleśotpattyā prahāṇaprayogaṃ nāśayati, middhaṃ punaś cittābhisaṃkṣepeṇa.
T06sambhu:86: na ca styānam anyeṣāṃ kleśopakleśānāṃ tathāsannam utpattipratyayo yathā middhasya;
T06sambhu:87: anyaḥ kleśopakleśa utpadyeta vā na votpadyeta, middhaṃ tāvat stimitajātasyāvaśyam utpadyate.
T06sambhu:89: jñātivitarkaṃ vā janapadavitarkaṃ vāmaravitarkaṃ vāgamya paurāṇaṃ vā hasitakrīḍitaramitaparicāritam anusmarato ’nusmārayato vā ya utpadyate cetaso ’vyupaśama utplāvitvam.
T06sambhu:92: „kasmād ahaṃ tebhyo jñātibhyo viyuktaḥ, taṃ vā janapadaṃ na gataḥ, taṃ vā janapadaṃ tyaktvehāgataḥ, yatraivaṃrūpaṃ khādyakaṃ khādyate, pānakaṃ pīyate, evaṃrūpāś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārā labhyante?
T06sambhu:94: tāvad āsito bhaviṣyaṃ yāvad vṛddhāvasthāt!“, paurāṇaṃ vā hasitakrīḍitādi samanusmarataḥ:
T06sambhu:95: „kasmād ahaṃ yasmin samaye krīḍāratimaṇḍanasthānayogam anuyuktena vihartavyam, tasmin samaye ’kāmakānāṃ jñātīnāṃ sāśrukaṇṭhānāṃ rudanmukhānāṃ pravrajitaḥ?“ ity evaṃrūpeṇa pratyayena ya utpadyate cetasa ālekho vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vipratisāraḥ.
T06sambhu:96: H 64b4; C 329c11 (2.2.1.4.3) ata eva ca tulyādhiṣṭhānatvād auddhatyakaukṛtyayor ekam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇaṃ kṛtvoktam.
T06sambhu:97: H 64b4; C 329c12 (2.2.1.4.4) karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṃ vā punar yathāyogaṃ kṛtavato vākṛtavato vā „kāryaṃ me na kṛtam, akāryaṃ me kṛtam” iti tatprathamata utpannaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ sthāpayitvā tad eva kaukṛtyaparyavasthānam aśaknuvato vinodayitum uttarakālaṃ yad utpadyate prābandhikaś cetasa ālekho vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vipratisāra ity ayam aparaḥ kaukṛtyanivaraṇaparyāyaḥ.
T06sambhu:98: H 64b5; C 329c16 (2.2.1.4.5) yad etad asthānajaṃ yac ca paścimaṃ kaukṛtyam, etan na tulyādhiṣṭhānam auddhatyena;
T06sambhu:99: api tu yathā tad utplavākāreṇāvyupaśamaṃ karoti, evam idam api daurmanasyākāreṇety ata etad api tena saha miśrayitvoktam.
T06sambhu:101: śāstari kāṅkṣati vicikitsati dharmaṃ śikṣām anuśāsanīṃ vādhigamaṃ vā.
T06sambhu:102: tasyaivaṃ kāṅkṣāvicikitsāprāptasya tac cittaṃ na praskandaty ātaptāyānuyogāya prahāṇāya pratisaṃlayanāya.
T06sambhu:103: atītaṃ vādhvānaṃ kāṅkṣato vicikitsataḥ – yathātītam evam anāgataṃ pratyutpannam – duḥkhādīni vā satyāni kāṅkṣato vicikitsato yaś cetaso dvaidhībhāvaḥ saṃdeho vimatiḥ kāṅkṣā.
T06sambhu:108: yat kāmānām agryaṃ varaṃ praṇītam, yato virakto ’nyato ’pi pratyavarād virakto bhavati, mahāmallanighāte tadanyamallanighātasiddhavat.
T06sambhu:110: yā strīsahagatā śubhatāṣṭasthānasaṃgṛhītā, yair aṣṭābhiḥ sthānaiḥ strī puruṣaṃ badhnāti, tadyathā nṛttena, gītena, hasitena, prekṣitena, varṇena, sparśena, ākalpena, vraṇabhaṅgena ca.
T06sambhu:111: ayam anutpannasya kāmacchandasyotpattaya utpannasya ca vṛddhaya āhāraḥ.
T06sambhu:117: imam eva kāyaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate;
T06sambhu:119: bahirdhā punar vinīlakādyaśubhatayā kāyam aśubhataḥ pratyavekṣate.
T06sambhu:123: kṛṣṇapakṣe tu manasikārād utpādaḥ, bahulīkārād bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatā.
T06sambhu:128: sa evāpakāraḥ pratighanimittam ayoniśomanaskārasahitaḥ, tadyathā navasv āghātavastuṣu.
T06sambhu:134: yena tu prahāṇaṃ bhavati vyāpādanivaraṇasya, tad evoktaṃ sūtre.
T06sambhu:143: tatrāndhakāraprātipakṣiko rātrīgatas tadyathā candratārakādayaḥ, divasagatas tadyathādityaḥ, tadubhayagatas tadyathāgnimaṇyādyālokaḥ.
T06sambhu:144: tatra dharmāloko yathāpīhaikatyo yathodgṛhītān yathācintitān yathāspṛṣṭāṃś ca dharmān pratyavekṣate buddhādyanusmṛtiṃ vā bhāvayati.
T06sambhu:146: H 65a6; C 330b2 (2.2.2.3.3) tatra prathamālokapratipakṣeṇa trividham andhakāraṃ veditavyam, yaduta niśāndhakāram, meghāndhakāram, tiraskaraṇāndhakāraṃ ca tadyathā guhādiṣu.
T06sambhu:147: dharmālokasya pratipakṣeṇa trayas tamaskāyāḥ, tathā hi tān dharmān yathābhūtam aprajānann atītam adhvānaṃ kāṅkṣati vicikitsaty anāgataṃ pratyutpannam
T06sambhu:149: tatra yā cāvidyā yā ca vicikitsā, tad ubhayaṃ tamaskāya ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:150: adhigatapratyavekṣāyāḥ punaḥ pratipakṣeṇa styānamiddham andhakāraḥ, tena hi taddharmāprasaṃkhyānāt.
T06sambhu:152: santi jñātivitarkādayaḥ, paurāṇaṃ ca hasitakrīḍitādy anusmartā bhavati;
T06sambhu:154: tatra jñātīnāṃ saṃpattiṃ vā vipattiṃ vā saṃyogaṃ vā viyogaṃ vāgamya harṣākārā dainyākārā vā yotpadyate cetaso ’rpaṇā vyarpaṇā ceti.
T06sambhu:155: janapadānāṃ tathaiva saṃpattyādīn āgamya vistareṇa janapadavitarkaḥ pūrvavat.
T06sambhu:157: dahratvaṃ vṛddhatvaṃ vetarakaraṇīyaṃ vā parārthakaraṇīyaṃ vāgamya harṣadainyākārā yā cetaso ’rpaṇeti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:159: hasitaṃ nāma yathāpi kaścid udghaṭṭakavādaṃ vā sabhāgatavādaṃ vāgamya dantavidarśakaṃ hasati saṃcagghati saṃkilikilāyate.
T06sambhu:160: tatra krīḍitaṃ tadyathākṣair vāstreḍair vā maṇibhir vā, anyad vā yad evaṃjātīyam.
T06sambhu:161: ramitaṃ yānyonyopabhogena vā viṣayopabhogena vopabhogaratiḥ, sahasthānavāsajalpādibhir vā yā vihāraratiḥ.
T06sambhu:162: tatra paricāritaṃ tadyathā hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhugrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vānyatamānyatamasya vāṅgajātasyāmarśanaṃ parāmarśanam āliṅgitaṃ cumbitaṃ prekṣitam iti, yad vā punar anyad evaṃbhāgīyaṃ paricaryākarma.
T06sambhu:166: tatra śamatho yā navākārā cittasthitiḥ śamathapakṣyāś ca dharmāḥ.
T06sambhu:167: te punar ye kecit saṃvejanīyāḥ, tadyathātmavipattiḥ, paravipattiḥ, ātmasaṃpattiḥ, parasaṃpattiś ca, yaiś cittaṃ saṃvijata uttrasyati saṃvegam āpadyate śame ’vatiṣṭhate.
T06sambhu:171: kiṃ nv aham abhūvam atīte ’dhvanīti vistareṇa pūrvavat:
T06sambhu:173: acintyāni punaḥ sthānāni tadyathātmacintā sattvacintā lokacintā.
T06sambhu:177: śāśvato lokaḥ, aśāśvataḥ, śāśvataś cāśāśvataś ca, naiva śāśvato nāśāśvata ity evamādi.
T06sambhu:181: tasya dharmamātraṃ dharmahetumātraṃ ca duḥkhamātraṃ duḥkhahetumātraṃ ca paśyato yāyoniśomanasikāranidānāvidyā, sā notpadyate triṣv adhvasu, utpannā ca prahīyate.
T06sambhu:182: H 65b6; C 330c9 (2.2.2.6.1) tatrāyoniśo manasikāro yoniśaś cāmanasikāras tad ubhayam abhisamasyāyoniśomanasikārād ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:183: H 65b6; C 330c10 (2.2.2.6.2) yo yatra yujyate, sa tatra jñeyaḥ;
T06sambhu:184: tadyathāndhakāra ālokasaṃjñāyogena yoniśo manasikāro na tv ayoniśaḥ;
T06sambhu:186: H 65b7; C 330c14 (2.3.1) tatra prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ draṣṭavyam:
T06sambhu:191: upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittasyaikāgratā ca.
T06sambhu:194: H 66a1; C 330c19 (2.3.2) tatra prathame dhyāne vitarko vicāraś cālambanagrahaṇārthena, samādhis tv eṣāṃ saṃniśrayārthena, prītir ālambanānubhavanārthena, sukhaṃ dauṣṭhulyāpakarṣaṇārthena.
T06sambhu:197: tṛtīye dhyāna upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajanyāny ālambanagrahaṇārthena, samādhis tanniśrayārthena;
T06sambhu:199: caturthe dhyāna upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiś cālambanagrahaṇārthena, samādhis tanniśrayārthena;
T06sambhu:201: H 66a2; C 330c25 (2.3.3) tadanyadharmasadbhāve ’py eṣām evāṅgatvaṃ pradhānatvād dhyāyināṃ copakāritvāt.
T06sambhu:202: H 66a2; C 330c27 (2.3.4) kena kāraṇena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram?
T06sambhu:203: tathā hi taiḥ kāmadhātuṃ ca vidūṣayati prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, na ca teṣu vitarkavicāreṣu doṣaṃ paśyati;
T06sambhu:204: dvitīye vā punar dhyāne teṣu doṣaṃ paśyatīti tatas teṣāṃ vyupaśamād dvitīyaṃ dhyānam.
T06sambhu:205: yathā hi dvitīye dhyāne vitarkavicāravyupaśamas taddoṣadarśanāt, evaṃ tṛtīye dhyāne prītivyupaśamas taddoṣadarśanāt.
T06sambhu:207: caturthe punar dhyāne sukhe doṣadarśanād upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhitaś ca viśeṣo veditavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:209: H 66a4; C 331a5 (2.4.1) adhicittam, cittapariśuddhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā samyagupanidhyānāt.
T06sambhu:210: H 66a4; C 331a6 (2.4.2) sukhavihārā ity api, teṣu paripūrṇasukhapratisaṃvedanāt.
T06sambhu:211: tathā hi teṣu prītisukhaṃ prasrabdhisukham upekṣāsukhaṃ kāyikacaitasikaṃ ca sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedyate.
T06sambhu:212: dhyāyibhir etāni samāpadya samāpadya vyutthāya vyutthāya pratisaṃvedyante dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogena.
T06sambhu:214: tatra vyutthāya „evaṃrūpeṇāhaṃ sukhavihāreṇa vyahārṣam“ iti pratisaṃvedayate.
T06sambhu:220: bhavanti khalv āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ praśnasya praṣṭāraḥ.
T06sambhu:221: saced āraṇyako bhikṣus tatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na vyākaroti, tato ’sya bhavanti vaktāraḥ:
T06sambhu:222: „kiṃ vatāraṇyakasyāraṇyakatvena, yatredānīm, ye śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyāḥ, tatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na vyākaroti!“ iti.
T06sambhu:224: H 66a6; C 331a17 (2.4.3) tadaṅganirvāṇam api dhyānam ucyate paryāyanirvāṇam api.
T06sambhu:225: kleśānām ekadeśaprahāṇāt tenāṅgena nirvāṇam iti kṛtvānekāntikatvāc ca.
T06sambhu:227: H 66b1; C 331a19 (2.4.4.1.1) tatra catvāri dhyānāni vedanānāṃ niḥsaraṇavastv ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:228: tatra daurmanasyasya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niḥsaraṇam, duḥkhendriyasya dvitīyam, saumanasyendriyasya tṛtīyam, sukhendriyasya caturtham, upekṣāyā
T06sambhu:230: tatrotpannaṃ bhikṣur daurmanasyendriyam utpannam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T06sambhu:232: tasyaiva prahāṇāya prayukto daurmanasyendriyeṇa vyavakīryamāṇāṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ jānāti.
T06sambhu:233: tat khalu sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ sākāraṃ sasaṃskāram iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
T06sambhu:240: tac ca yan nimittaṃ yac cājñānabījaṃ daurmanasyendriyasamutthāpakam.
T06sambhu:246: evaṃ ca punaḥ parijñāya niḥsaraṇe cittaṃ pradadhāti.
T06sambhu:248: kliṣṭāt pracārāc cittaṃ vinivartya manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ saṃniyojayati.
T06sambhu:249: tat punas tatrāpariśeṣaṃ nirudhyate yāvat paryādānaṃ gacchatīty anuśayataś ca paryavasthānataś ca.
T06sambhu:250: tatra laukikena dhyānena tatpakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyaṃ prajahāti, na tu bījasthānam asyoddharati.
T06sambhu:251: tadanyathā hi taduddhārād āyatyām anutpattir evāsya syāt.
T06sambhu:254: H 66b4; C 331b10 (2.4.4.1.3.1) kīdṛśaṃ punar daurmanasyendriyaṃ parijānāti?
T06sambhu:257: H 66b5; C 331b11 (2.4.4.1.3.2) duḥkhendriyam adhyātmādyadhipateyaṃ vā kāyaśramādhipateyam agnidāhādyadhipateyaṃ vā parābhighātādyadhipateyaṃ vā vītarāgasyāpi yad utpadyate.
T06sambhu:258: H 66b5; C 331b14 (2.4.4.1.3.3) saumanasyendriyaṃ dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyadhyānabhūmikam.
T06sambhu:259: H 66b5; C 331b14 (2.4.4.1.3.4) sukhendriyaṃ tṛtīye dhyāne tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikam.
T06sambhu:260: H 66b5; C 331b15 (2.4.4.1.4.1) kasmāt punaḥ prathame dhyāne duḥkhendriyaṃ na prahīṇam ity ucyate?
T06sambhu:262: H 66b6; C 331b17 (2.4.4.1.4.2) kena kāraṇena tad upapannasya dhyāne na samudācaraty aprahīṇam api?
T06sambhu:264: H 66b6; C 331b19 (2.4.4.1.4.3) sacet punaḥ prathame ’pi dhyāne tad duḥkhendriyaṃ prahīyeta, tata iha prathamadvitīyadhyānasamāpannayor yoginor vihāraviśeṣo na syād vedanākṛtaḥ;
T06sambhu:267: na cāsya vitarkavicāravyupaśamena kaścid dauṣṭhulyaprahāṇaviśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt.
T06sambhu:268: evam anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ tatpakṣyadauṣṭhulyaprahāṇād uttareṣāṃ prahāṇaṃ veditavyam.
T06sambhu:269: H 66b7; C 331b24 (2.4.4.1.5) animittaṃ punar atra sūtre ’nimittaś cetaḥsamādhir upadiṣṭo bhagavatā.
T06sambhu:270: tatropekṣendriyam apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyate – anuśayatas tatpakṣyadauṣṭhulyasamudghātāt, na tu paryavasthānatas tatra tasya nirodho ’sti, animittasyāvaśyaṃ
T06sambhu:271: tatra punas trayāṇām api sukhasaumanasyopekṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavaḥ;
T06sambhu:273: yasya punaḥ kleśasya prahāṇād eṣāṃ prahāṇaṃ bhavati, tatpakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyam eṣām anuśaya ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:276: H 67a2; C 331c1 (2.4.4.2.1.1) eṣāṃ pañcendriyāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇānām ānimittaparyantānāṃ pañcabhir niḥsaraṇīyair dhātubhir anyonyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:277: tatra kāmavyāpādavihiṃsānāṃ niḥsaraṇair yāvatsukhendriyaniḥsaraṇam uktaṃ bhavati.
T06sambhu:281: eṣu hi sthito niḥsṛto veditavyaḥ, tenocyante niḥsaraṇīyā iti;
T06sambhu:282: na tu tais teṣāṃ niḥsaraṇam, vītarāgāṇāṃ taddhātunirdeśāt.
T06sambhu:283: H 67a3; C 331c8 (2.4.4.2.1.3) yadā kāmavyāpādavihiṃsānāṃ samānakālam eva prahāṇaṃ bhavati, tat kena kāraṇena pṛthaṅ niḥsaraṇam eṣāṃ vyavasthāpitam?
T06sambhu:284: tulyakāle ’py eṣāṃ niḥsaraṇe pratipakṣabhāvanāviśeṣāt trividho niḥsaraṇavyapadeśaḥ.
T06sambhu:287: tatra kaścid aśubhāṃ bhāvayan sarvebhyo niḥsarati, kaścin maitrīm, kaścit karuṇām iti.
T06sambhu:288: ata eva ca pṛthaṅ niḥsaraṇopadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ.
T06sambhu:289: tadūrdhvaṃ punar ekajātīya eva pratipakṣa iti nāsty ūrdhvaṃ bhedaḥ.
T06sambhu:290: H 67a4; C 331c14 (2.4.4.2.1.4.1) kathaṃ tīvradṛṣṭiḥ kāmān samanusmarati?
T06sambhu:321: H 67a7; C 331c29 (2.4.4.2.1.4.2) etadviparyayāc ca punar naiṣkramyaṃ manasikurvataḥ:
T06sambhu:326: H 67b1; C 332a4 (2.4.4.2.1.4.3) tatra nirvidādiṣu pratikūlākāreṣu vartamānasyāpratihatam asya tac cittaṃ bhavati, upekṣāyāṃ punar anābhogam.
T06sambhu:327: kathaṃ sugatam asya tac cittaṃ bhavati?
T06sambhu:332: tatra muktaṃ paryavasthānavimokṣāt, vimuktam ālambananimittavimokṣāt, vipramuktam anuśayavimokṣāt.
T06sambhu:334: ye ’sya kāmapratyayā utpadyanta āsravā iti kāmarāgaṃ sthāpayitvā ye tadanye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ.
T06sambhu:335: vighātā ye tannidānā evotpadyante duścaritaviśeṣā daṇḍādānādayaḥ, yeṣāṃ kṛtopacitatvād apāyeṣūpapadyate.
T06sambhu:336: paridāhā yat tannidānaṃ kāmatṛṣṇayā khādyamānaḥ paridahyate kāyena cittena ca.
T06sambhu:337: upāyāsā yat tannidānaṃ tadvastuvipariṇāmād utpadyante śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ.
T06sambhu:338: muktaḥ sa tebhyo vyutthito visaṃyukta iti pūrvavad yathākramaṃ paryavasthānālambanānuśayavimokṣāt.
T06sambhu:340: viṣayān upalabdhukāmasyopalabhamānasya vā samanusmarato vā tenāśrayeṇa kliṣṭavedanāsamudācārataḥ.
T06sambhu:342: H 67b4; C 332a20 (2.4.4.2.2) ṣaḍ ime niḥsaraṇīyā dhātavaḥ.
T06sambhu:343: te punar yathāsūtram eva bhāvitā me maitrī yāvad asmīti me vigatam, atha ca punar me vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaś cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhatīti.
T06sambhu:344: tasmāt „na maitryādayo vyāpādādipratipakṣaḥ” ity asadgrāhatyājanārtham eṣāṃ vyavasthānaṃ draṣṭavyam.
T06sambhu:345: tatra caturṇāṃ vyāpādādivairāgyapratipakṣabhedena vyavasthānaṃ bhavati, ānimittasya nimittapratipakṣeṇāryavihāraprāptiparīkṣāyogena ca, ṣaṣṭhasya niṣṭḥāgamanaparīkṣāyogena ca.
T06sambhu:352: vigatāsmimānasya sve vimokṣe ’dhigame vā nāsti kathaṃkathāsaṃbhava ity ato ’smimānavigamas tatpratipakṣaḥ.
T06sambhu:356: H 67b7; C 332b4 (2.4.4.2.3) tatra ye pūrvakāḥ pañca niḥsaraṇīyā dhātavaḥ, teṣāṃ pūrvakāś catvāro divyavihārasaṃgṛhītāḥ, pañcama āryavihārasaṃgṛhītaḥ.
T06sambhu:357: ṣaṇṇāṃ punar niḥsaraṇīyānāṃ catvāro brāhmavihārasaṃgṛhītāḥ, pañcamaḥ ṣaṣṭhaś cāryavihārasaṃgṛhītāv eva.
T06sambhu:359: H 68a1; C 332b7 (2.4.4.3.1) tasmin niḥsaraṇe pratisartavyānīti pratisaraṇāni.
T06sambhu:365: H 68a2; C 332b11 (2.4.4.3.2) katham eṣāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
T06sambhu:367: kuhakapudgalabhedāt prathamasya, lokāyatikapudgalabhedād dvitīyasya, svayaṃdṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyipudgalabhedāt tṛtīyasya, śrutaparamapudgalabhedāc
T06sambhu:368: H 68a2; C 332b15 (2.4.4.3.3.1) tatra kuhake dharmaḥ pratisaraṇaṃ na pudgalaḥ, sāṃkathyaviniścayena jñānādhigamyatvān neryāpathamātrakeṇeti.
T06sambhu:371: tatra dharma eva pratisaraṇaṃ na pudgalo janapadanirukter anabhiniveśāt.
T06sambhu:372: H 68a3; C 332b20 (2.4.4.3.3.2) sa punar dharmo dvividhaḥ:
T06sambhu:375: na hi śrutaparameṇa bhavitavyam, api tv arthaś cintayitavyas tulayitavya upaparīkṣitavya iti.
T06sambhu:376: H 68a4; C 332b22 (2.4.4.3.3.3) tatra bhagavatā nītārtham api sūtraṃ deśitaṃ neyārtham api.
T06sambhu:377: tatrārtham upaparīkṣamāṇasya nītārtham eva sūtraṃ pratisaraṇaṃ na neyārtham.
T06sambhu:378: H 68a4; C 332b23 (2.4.4.3.3.4) tatra bhagavatā puṇyāneñjyopagam api vijñānaṃ deśitaṃ sugatigamanāya, caturṣv apy āryasatyeṣu jñānaṃ deśitaṃ
T06sambhu:379: tatra dharmasyānudharmaṃ pratipadyamānasya jñānaṃ pratisaraṇaṃ na vijñānam.
T06sambhu:380: H 68a5; C 332b26 (2.4.4.3.4) tatra samāsataś caturṣu kāleṣu praṇāśād apraṇāśāc ca catvāraḥ pudgalā vyavasthāpitāḥ:
T06sambhu:381: dharmaparyāptikāle, dhāraṇakāle, arthopaparīkṣaṇakāle, dharmānudharmapratipattikāle ca catvāri pratisaraṇāni vyavasthāpitāni.
T06sambhu:384: H 68a6; C 332c1 (3.0) eṣu punar dhyānādiṣu manaskāro ’pi veditavya ālambanam api.
T06sambhu:385: H 68a6; C 332c2 (3.1.0) tatra sapta maulā manaskārāḥ, apare catvāriṃśan manaskārāḥ.
T06sambhu:387: tadyathā lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī, ādhimokṣikaḥ, prāvivekyaḥ, ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ, mīmāṃsāmanaskāraḥ, prayoganiṣṭhaḥ, prayoganiṣṭhāphalaś ca manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:395: adhimuktivicayamanaskāraḥ, aupaśamikaḥ, ekāṃśabhāvitaḥ, ubhayāṃśabhāvitaḥ, sātatyamanaskāraḥ, satkṛtyamanaskāraḥ;
T06sambhu:399: parapraṇītaḥ, pratyātmādhigrahaḥ, udāraḥ, sarvatragaś ca manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:402: H 68b2; C 332c19 (3.1.2.2.2) arthālambano yaś cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā ca prajñayā saṃprayuktaḥ.
T06sambhu:403: H 68b2; C 332c20 (3.1.2.2.3–6) kāyālambano yāvad dharmālambanaḥ smṛtyupasthānaprayuktasya kāyādīn yoniśo manasikurvato yo manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:404: H 68b3; C 332c22 (3.1.2.2.7) adhimuktimanaskāro yo dhyāyināṃ yathecchaṃ nimittaṃ vastv adhimucyatām.
T06sambhu:405: H 68b3; C 332c23 (3.1.2.2.8) tattvamanaskāraḥ svalakṣaṇataḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇataś ca yoniśo dharmān manasikurvato yo manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:409: saṃtānataḥ sarva eva śaikṣasya kuśalo manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:410: H 68b4; C 332c27 (3.1.2.2.10) yathā śaikṣa evam aśaikṣo ’pi dvividho veditavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:411: H 68b4; C 332c28 (3.1.2.2.11) naiva śaikṣo nāśaikṣaḥ sarva eva laukiko manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:412: H 68b4; C 332c29 (3.1.2.2.12) parijñāmanaskāro yenālambanaṃ parijānāti, no tu kleśān prajahāti.
T06sambhu:414: H 68b4; C 333a2 (3.1.2.2.14) prahīṇe manaskāro yaḥ prahīṇeṣu kleśeṣūttaratra manaskāraḥ.
T06sambhu:415: H 68b4; C 333a2 (3.1.2.2.15) savikalpapratibimbālambano manaskāro yena vikalpaśarīrālambanāṃ vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati.
T06sambhu:416: H 68b5; C 333a4 (3.1.2.2.16) nirvikalpapratibimbālambano yena vikalpaśarīrālambanaṃ śamathaṃ bhāvayati.
T06sambhu:417: H 68b5; C 333a5 (3.1.2.2.17) vastuparyantālambano yena kāyavedanācittadharmāṇāṃ kāyādiparyantatām ālambate:
T06sambhu:418: „ataḥ paraṃ kāyo nāsti yāvad dharmā na santi“ iti.
T06sambhu:419: H 68b5; C 333a7 (3.1.2.2.18) kāryapariniṣpattyālambano manaskāro yaḥ „idaṃ me manasikurvataḥ, evaṃ me manasikurvata idaṃ cedaṃ ca bhaviṣyati, idaṃ cedaṃ ca niṣpatsyate“ iti, yaś ca pariśuddhyālambanālambanaḥ.
T06sambhu:420: H 68b6; C 333a10 (3.1.2.2.19) adhimuktivicayamanaskāro yena tatprathamato vā dharmān vicinoti śamathaṃ vā pūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā.
T06sambhu:421: H 68b6; C 333a12 (3.1.2.2.20) aupaśamiko manaskāro yat tatprathamato vādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ sthāpayato vipaśyanāṃ vā pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā.
T06sambhu:422: H 68b6; C 333a13 (3.1.2.2.21) ekāṃśabhāvito manaskāro yenaikāṃśena śamathaṃ bhāvayati vipaśyanāṃ vā.
T06sambhu:423: H 68b7; C 333a15 (3.1.2.2.22) ubhayāṃśabhāvito manaskāro yenobhayaṃ samayugaṃ bhāvayati.
T06sambhu:424: H 68b7; C 333a15 (3.1.2.2.23) sātatyamanasikāro yaḥ sarvakāliko niśchidranirantaravāhī.
T06sambhu:426: H 68b7; C 333a17 (3.1.2.2.ad19–24) tatrādhimuktivicayamanaskāreṇa jñānadarśanaṃ viśodhayati, aupaśamikena prasrabdhiṃ janayati;
T06sambhu:430: H 69a1; C 333a22 (3.1.2.2.25) anulomiko manaskāro yaḥ kleśaprahāṇāyānukūlaḥ, yenālambanaṃ vidūṣayati.
T06sambhu:431: H 69a1; C 333a23 (3.1.2.2.26) prātipakṣiko yena kleśaṃ prajahāti prahāṇam ādhārayati kleśebhyaś ca saṃtatiṃ dūrīkaroti.
T06sambhu:432: H 69a1; C 333a25 (3.1.2.2.27) prasadanīyo manaskāro yaḥ ṣaḍ anusmṛtīr bhāvayataḥ, anyatamad vā prasadanīyaṃ vastu manasikurvataḥ.
T06sambhu:433: H 69a2; C 333a26 (3.1.2.2.28) pratyavekṣaṇīyo yena kleśāṇāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ parimīmāṃsate, svaṃ vādhigamaṃ pratyavekṣate pūrvavyavacāritān vā dharmān.
T06sambhu:434: H 69a2; C 333a28 (3.1.2.2.29) balavāhano ya ādikarmikāṇām alabdhamanaskārāṇām.
T06sambhu:435: H 69a2; C 333b1 (3.1.2.2.30) sacchidravāhano yo labdhamanaskārāṇām uttari śithilaprayogāṇāṃ ca.
T06sambhu:436: H 69a2; C 333b2 (3.1.2.2.31) sābhogavāhanas teṣām evārabdhavīryāṇām aśithilaprayogāṇām.
T06sambhu:437: H 69a3; C 333b4 (3.1.2.2.32) svarasavāhano yaś caturṣu kāleṣu niyato bhavati:
T06sambhu:438: manaskāralābhakāle, maulasamāpattikāle samāpannānāṃ ca, abhisamayakāle, arhattvaprāptikāle prāpte ca.
T06sambhu:441: H 69a3; C 333b8 (3.1.2.2.35) āvaraṇaviśodhano yenāsravān prajahāti, dauṣṭhulyaṃ samudghātayati.
T06sambhu:442: H 69a4; C 333b9 (3.1.2.2.36) āśrayaniṣpattigocaraviśuddho yenāpagatasarvadauṣṭhulya āśraya ālambane carato ’pi kleśo na samudācarati.
T06sambhu:443: H 69a4; C 333b12 (3.1.2.2.37) parapraṇītas tadyathā śrāvakāṇām, parato ghoṣam āgamyādhyātmaṃ yoniśomanaskārataḥ.
T06sambhu:444: H 69a4; C 333b13 (3.1.2.2.38) pratyātmādhigrahas tadyathā pratyekabuddhabodhisattvānām anācāryakābhisaṃbodhāt.
T06sambhu:445: H 69a5; C 333b15 (3.1.2.2.39) udāro manaskāras tadyathā bodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāradoṣatanniḥsaraṇajñānāṃ bodhipraṇidhānagataḥ.
T06sambhu:446: H 69a5; C 333b17 (3.1.2.2.40) sarvatrago manaskāras tadyathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvatrāviparokṣānāvaraṇajñānena saṃprayuktaḥ, bodhisattvānāṃ ca triṣu yāneṣu kauśalyaṃ kurvatāṃ pañcasu vā punar vidyāsthāneṣu.
T06sambhu:447: H 69a6; C 333b20 (3.1.3.ad1–2) tatra lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāro dharmālambano ’py arthālambano ’pi;
T06sambhu:449: H 69a6; C 333b21 (3.1.3.ad3–6) kāyādyālambanā manaskārāḥ sarveṣu saptasu veditavyāḥ.
T06sambhu:450: H 69a6; C 333b21 (3.1.3.ad7–8) lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī, ādhimokṣikaḥ, prayoganiṣṭhāphalaś cādhimuktitattvamanaskārasaṃgṛhītāḥ;
T06sambhu:452: śeṣās trayas tattvamanaskārā eva pūrvakaṃ paryāyaṃ niśritya.
T06sambhu:454: H 69b1; C 333b24 (3.1.3.ad9–11) sarve sapta śaikṣā naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣāś ca;
T06sambhu:457: H 69b1; C 333b27 (3.1.3.ad12–14) lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī, ādhimokṣikaḥ, mīmāṃsāmanaskāraś ca parijñāmanaskārāḥ;
T06sambhu:460: H 69b2; C 333b29 (3.1.3.ad15–18) savikalpapratibimbālambana eva mīmāṃsāmanaskāraḥ, śeṣā ubhayathā.
T06sambhu:462: kāryapariniṣpattyālambanāḥ prathamena paryāyeṇa sarve, dvitīyena prayoganiṣṭhāphala eva.
T06sambhu:463: H 69b2; C 333c4 (3.1.3.ad19–24) adhimuktivicayamanaskāro yas tatprathamaḥ so ’saṃgṛhītaḥ, yaḥ śamathapūrvakaḥ sa sarveṣu.
T06sambhu:467: H 69b3; C 333c9 (3.1.3.ad25–28) ānulomiko dvābhyāṃ prathamābhyām, prātipakṣikaḥ prāvivekyaprayoganiṣṭhābhyāṃ saṃgṛhīto ratisaṃgrāhakaikadeśena
T06sambhu:479: H 69b5; C 333c19 (3.1.3.ad37–40) parapraṇītaḥ pratyātmādhigrahaś ca sarvaiḥ.
T06sambhu:483: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino yadi parapraṇītaḥ, tena parato ghoṣo ’dhyātmaṃ ca yoniśomanaskāraḥ samāhitasya nidānam;
T06sambhu:484: atha pratyātmādhigrahaḥ, tena pūrvasaṃbhāra evāsya nidānam.
T06sambhu:501: indriyair aguptadvāratā, bhojane ’mātrajñatā, pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam ananuyuktatā, asaṃprajānavihāritā, mohacaritatā, svapnālukatā, anupāyajñatā, kausīdyasahagataś chando vīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā ca, śamathānabhyāsaḥ, śamathe ’kṛtaparijayasyaikāṃśaśamathamanasikāraḥ, andhakārāyitatvaṃ cetasaḥ, ālambane ’priyārohitā ca.
T06sambhu:503: indriyair aguptadvāratādayaḥ pūrvavac catvāraḥ, rāgacaritatā, anupaśamālukatā, asaṃvignacittatā, anupāyajñatā, atipragrahasahagatāś chandādayaḥ pūrvavat, pragrahānabhyāsaḥ, pragrahe ’kṛtaparijayasya tadekāṃśabhāvanā, anyatamānyatamenauddhatyasthānīyena dharmeṇa cetaso vikṣepo jñātivitarkādinā.
T06sambhu:505: catvāra indriyāguptadvāratādayaḥ pūrvavat, vitarkacaritatā, mṛdvindriyatā, bahvarthabahukṛtyabahukarmāntatā, asaṃvignacittatā, anupāyajñatā, pravivekānabhyāsaḥ, ālambane ’priyārohitā, saṃsargeṇa prayogacchidrīkaraṇatā, vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñānavadhānatā ca.
T06sambhu:507: catvāra indriyāguptadvāratādayaḥ pūrvavat, mṛdvindriyatā, tṛṣṇācaritatā, kleśabahulatā, ayoniśomanaskāraḥ, anādīnavadarśanatā, uttariṃ cāniḥsaraṇadarśitā.
T06sambhu:508: H 70a5; C 334a17 (3.2.1.4B) teṣāṃ parivarjanīyānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa yathāyogaṃ pratiniṣevaṇīyāni veditavyāni.
T06sambhu:510: svacittanimittam, bahirdhānimittam, āśrayanimittam, gocaranimittam, manaskāranimittam, cittasyotpādanimittam, sthitinimittam, svalakṣaṇanimittam, sāmānyalakṣaṇanimittam, audārikanimittam, śāntatānimittam, anubhavanimittam, vikalpanimittam, sahānucaram, kliṣṭanimittam, akliṣṭanimittam, samyakprayoganimittam, mithyāprayoganimittam, ālokanimittam, pratyavekṣaṇānimittam, bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittam, śamathanimittam, pragrahanimittam, vipaśyanānimittam, upekṣānimittam, samādhinimittam, samādhisthitinimittam, samādhivyutthānanimittam, āyanimittam, apāyanimittam, upāyanimittam, abhinirhāranimittaṃ ca.
T06sambhu:512: iha bhikṣuḥ pūrvam eva cittasaṃkleśāt svacitte sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhṇāti:
T06sambhu:513: „evaṃ caivaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃkliśyate vā na vā saṃkliśyate“ iti.
T06sambhu:514: „ayam upāyaś cittalayādiṣu, ayam alayādiṣu caturṣu“ iti yāvat „cittāsaṅgāya”;
T06sambhu:517: yathāpi tat saṃkliṣṭe citte „saṃkliṣṭaṃ me cittam“ iti viditvā bahirdhā nimittam udgṛhṇāti yāvad etasyaiva saṃkleśasyāpanayanāyāsamudācārāya, yadutālokanimittaṃ vā prasadanīyaṃ vā yad vā punar anyad api.
T06sambhu:521: yasya yasya viṣayasya rūpādidharmaparyantasya vikalpaśarīraṃ manasikaroti.
T06sambhu:523: sati tajje manaskāre tatra tatra viṣaye tajjasya vijñānasyotpādo bhavati.
T06sambhu:524: „idaṃ khalu me cittaṃ manasikārād gocare pravartate nāmanasikārāt“ iti manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:527: dvitīyaṃ „saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca cittam“ iti manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:530: rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:532: svajātilakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyekalakṣaṇaṃ vā manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:534: saṃskārasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā sāsravasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā sarvadharmasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:536: adharāṃ bhūmim audārikataḥ paśyato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:540: pūrvānubhūtān atītān saṃskārān samanusmarato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:546: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti manasikurvato vistareṇa yāvad asuvimuktaṃ cittam iti manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:549: H 71a2; C 334b25 (3.2.2.2.ad15–16) tatra sarāgādipratyavekṣā niṣkrāntānām aprahāṇaprayuktānām;
T06sambhu:551: tatra sarāgaṃ yad rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ yad vā tatpakṣyadauṣṭhulyānugatam.
T06sambhu:552: evaṃ paryavasthānānuśayābhyāṃ sarvāṇi cittāni kliṣṭāni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni, paryavasthānānuśayapratipakṣeṇa vā punar akliṣṭāni.
T06sambhu:557: „evam indriyair aguptadvārasya viharato yāvad asaṃprajānadvihāriṇa evaṃ caivaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃkliṣṭam“ iti manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:559: yathāpīhaikatyenāndhakāraprātipakṣikād dharmālokād vā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtaṃ yathādhas tathordhvam ity
T06sambhu:562: iha bhikṣuṇā pratyavekṣaṇānimittam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati, tadyathā sthito niṣaṇṇaṃ pratyavekṣata iti vartamānena grāhakeṇānāgatagrāhyadharmapratyavekṣā.
T06sambhu:563: niṣaṇṇo vā nipannam iti vartamānenaiva grāhakeṇātītagrāhyadharmapratyavekṣā.
T06sambhu:564: purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣata ity uttarottareṇa grāhakeṇa pūrvakagrāhakadharmapratyavekṣā;
T06sambhu:569: sarveṣāṃ kleśānāṃ pradhānaṃ rāgaḥ sarveṣāṃ ca rāgāṇāṃ sarvaduḥkhasamudghātyaḥ kāmarāgaḥ;
T06sambhu:575: anyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālokanimittena vā cittaṃ pragṛhṇato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:577: śrutamayyā cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā ca prajñayā dharmān manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:581: yair nidānālambananiṣevaṇīyair nimittaiḥ samādhiṃ samāpadyate pratilabdhaṃ vā saṃmukhīkaroti.
T06sambhu:584: sūdgṛhītatvād yāvad ākāṅkṣati tāvat samāpannas tiṣṭhati;
T06sambhu:585: ye ca tasya samādher aparihāṇīyā dharmāḥ.
T06sambhu:589: pratilabdhasya samādher bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:591: pratilabdhasya samādher hānim apacayaṃ tanutvaṃ manasikurvato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:596: viśālapadavyañjanam artham abhisaṃkṣipataḥ, abhijñāṃ vābhinirharato ’raṇāpratisaṃvitpraṇidhijñānāni vānyaṃ vā samādhisaṃniśrayeṇa vaiśeṣikaṃ guṇaṃ balavaiśāradyādīni vā, gambhīraṃ vārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhyato yan nimittam.
T06sambhu:597: H 71b4; C 335a4 (3.2.3) eṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ nimittānāṃ caturbhir mūlanimittaiḥ saṃgraho bhavati.
T06sambhu:599: nidānanimittena ca, pūrvakam uttarasya nidānam iti kṛtvottarottaraprabhāsvaratāyai.
T06sambhu:603: tatra kliṣṭaṃ nimittaṃ sarvam eva parivarjanīyam.
T06sambhu:604: tadanyat pratiniṣevaṇīyaṃ tatra tatra kāle veditavyam.
T06sambhu:605: H 71b5; C 335a15 (3.2.4) tatra katham ālambananimitte manasikāraṃ bhāvayati?
T06sambhu:606: yad yad eva nimittaṃ manasikaroti, tan manasikurvaṃś catvāri kāryāṇi karoti:
T06sambhu:607: tam eva manasikāraṃ pratiniṣevate, tadvipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ dūrīkaroti, tam eva manasikāraṃ tadanyaṃ vottāpayati yadutāyatyām uttaptatarotpattaye, pratiniṣevamāṇaś ca taṃ manasikāram ālambanaṃ vidūṣayati, kleśaṃ prajahāti, prahāṇam ādhārayati, dūrīkaroti saṃtatiṃ kleśebhyaḥ.
T06sambhu:609: H 71b6; C 335a22 (3.3.0) caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāvad bhavāgram:
T06sambhu:616: dhyānādhipateyā anena bahavo dharmāḥ śrutā bhavanti dhṛtā iti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:617: sa tān eva dharmān niśrityaiko vyavakṛṣṭo ’pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan dharmasyānudharmaṃ pratipadyamāno dhyānaṃ samāpadyate.
T06sambhu:619: ācāryasya vopādhyāyasya vānyatamasyānyatamasya vā gurusthānīyasyāntikāt prathamasya dhyānasyānulomikīm avavādānuśāsanīṃ pratilabhate ’vaśiṣṭānāṃ
T06sambhu:620: sa tām eva manasikurvan dhyānaṃ samāpadyate.
T06sambhu:621: H 72a1; C 335b6 (3.3.2) ta ete catvāro yogino hetubalikaḥ prayogabalikas tīkṣnendriyo mṛdvindriyaś ca.
T06sambhu:625: pūrvam evānena dhyānasamāpatter anuśaṃsaḥ śruto bhavati, niḥsaraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ bhavati.
T06sambhu:629: ihaikatyena svasya śāstur antikāc chrutaṃ bhavaty anyato vā:
T06sambhu:631: evaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāvad bhavāgram“ iti.
T06sambhu:632: sa tām eva dṛṣṭiṃ niśrityātaptānvayāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate;
T06sambhu:633: tathā samāpannaś ca pūrvakam ātmabhāvam anekān kalpān samanusmarati.
T06sambhu:636: tasmāt samādher vyutthitaḥ sa tām eva dṛṣṭiṃ gāḍhīkaroti, uttaratra ca dhyāyati pradhyāyaty avadhyāyati:
T06sambhu:640: „amuko nāmāyuṣmān prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāvad bhavāgram“ iti.
T06sambhu:644: sa taṃ mānaṃ niśrityātaptānvayāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate;
T06sambhu:647: „aham asmi lābhī prathamadhyānasamāpatteḥ, anye tu na tathā.“ sa tam eva mānaṃ niśrityottari dhyāyati pradhyāyaty avadhyāyate.
T06sambhu:650: sa ca bhavati pūrvaṃ śamathacaritaḥ, tato dhyānaṃ samāpadyate;
T06sambhu:651: tathā samāpannaś cottari vyāyacchate ’prāptasya prāptaye caturṇām āryasatyānām abhisamayāya.
T06sambhu:652: sa mandatvān momuhatvān na śaknoti satyābhisamayaṃ kartum.
T06sambhu:653: tasyānyeṣām apy adhigama utpadyate kāṅkṣā, utpadyate vicikitsā.
T06sambhu:654: tāṃ ca kāṅkṣāṃ niśrityottari dhyāyate pradhyāyate ’vadhyāyate.
T06sambhu:655: H 72a6; C 335c6 (3.5.1.1) katham āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate?
T06sambhu:656: mṛdvindriyo bhavati rāgacarito vā kleśotsado vā.
T06sambhu:657: sa prathamadhyānasamāpatter anuśaṃsaṃ śṛṇoti vistareṇa yathā tṛṣṇottaradhyāyī.
T06sambhu:658: sa uttari niḥsaraṇam aprajānann āsvādayati nigamayaty adhyavasyaty adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati.
T06sambhu:661: H 72b1; C 335c11 (3.5.1.2) kathaṃ śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate?
T06sambhu:662: madhyendriyo bhavati tīkṣṇendriyo vā, samakleśo mandarajasko vā.
T06sambhu:663: sa parataḥ prathamadhyānasamāpatter āsvādam ādīnavaṃ ca śṛṇoty uttare ca niḥsaraṇam.
T06sambhu:665: samāpadya tam evādīnavaṃ manasikurvann uttari ca niḥsaraṇaṃ prajānan nāsvādayati.
T06sambhu:666: H 72b1; C 335c15 (3.5.1.3) katham anāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate?
T06sambhu:667: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śraddhānusārī vā bhavati dharmānusārī vā mandarajaskajātīyaḥ.
T06sambhu:668: tena pūrvam eva catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni bhavanti, abhisamayāya vā prayuktaḥ.
T06sambhu:669: sa yair ākārair liṅgair nimittaiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, sa naiva tān ākārāṃl liṅgāni nimittāni manasikaroti, api tu yat tatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvad vijñānagataṃ vā, tān dharmān rogādibhir ākārair manasikurvaṃs tebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaś cittam udvejayaty uttrāsayati prativārayaty amṛte ca dhātāv upasaṃharati.
T06sambhu:673: sa ātaptānvayāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna eva tatra prītiṃ ca sukhaṃ cānuśaṃsaṃ cāsahamānas tasmād dhyānāt parihīyate.
T06sambhu:674: yathā yathā samāpadyate tathā tathā parihīyata eva, yāvan nendriyāṇy uttāpayati.
T06sambhu:678: sa tad āsvādayan na cottari niḥsarati na cādhaḥ parihīyate.
T06sambhu:681: sa tayā samāpattyāsaṃtuṣṭatvāt tac ca nāsvādayaty uttari ca vyāyacchate.
T06sambhu:687: tadyathā nirviddho maṇiḥ, nirviddho ghaṭaḥ, nirviddhā kacchety ucyate;
T06sambhu:688: yasmāt pareṇa vedho nāsti, sa nirviddha ity ucyate;
T06sambhu:689: evam eva yasmāt pareṇa prativedho na bhavati, tan nirvedhabhāgīyam ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:692: so ’nupūrvaṃ pratilomaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ prathamaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyate.
T06sambhu:694: teṣām eva pariśuddhatvāt prathamadhyānasamanantaraṃ tṛtīyaṃ samāpadyate;
T06sambhu:697: nāsti tṛtīyāt pareṇa vyutkrāntakasamāpattir iti viprakṛṣṭatvāt.
T06sambhu:699: sthāpayitvā tathāgataṃ dvyasaṃkhyeyaniryātaṃ ca bodhisattvam, tayor yathākāmaṃ samāpattisaṃbhavāt.
T06sambhu:701: yathāpy ekatyo lābhī bhavati sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām.
T06sambhu:702: sa samāpatter vaśitāṃ vā prāptukāmo bhavati samāpattivaśitāphalaṃ vā pratyanubhavitukāmaḥ.
T06sambhu:703: pravāhayuktaṃ sāsravam anāsravaṃ vā dhyānam anyonyavyavakīrṇaṃ samāpadyate yāvat sāsravasamanantaram anāsravam anāsravasamanantaraṃ sāsravam.
T06sambhu:705: sa yatra yadā yāvad icchati, tatra tadā tāvat samāpadyata iti.
T06sambhu:708: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāro ’sya prabhāsvarataro bhavati, tasya cānenāparihāṇīyo mārgaḥ pratilabdho bhavati, vimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanānāṃ cābhinirhārāya mārgaḥ pariśodhito bhavati.
T06sambhu:709: sacet sopadhiśeṣaḥ kālaṃ karoti, tataḥ śuddhāvāsān praviśati.
T06sambhu:710: H 73a3; C 336a29 (3.6.2.2) mṛdumadhyādhimātradhyānasamāpattibhedena sarvatra tisro bhūmayaḥ pūrvavat tadyathā savitarkasavicārāyāṃ bhūmau.
T06sambhu:711: avitarkaṃ vicāramātraṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmatvaṃ labhyate.
T06sambhu:712: H 73a3; C 336b2 (3.6.2.3) mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarādhimātratamabhāvitatvād vyavakīrṇabhāvitānāṃ pañca śuddhāvāsabhūmayo nirvṛttāḥ.
T06sambhu:713: H 73a3; C 336b3 (3.6.2.4) tatra śuddhakadhyānasamāpattyā dhyānabhūmiṣūpapattir veditavyā nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktena.
T06sambhu:714: upapanno vā punaḥ saced āsvādayati, tasyāś cyavate;
T06sambhu:715: atha śuddhakaṃ bhāvayati, tatraiva vopapadyate ’dho vā;
T06sambhu:717: iha ca pūrvaṃ samāpattiḥ, tataḥ paścāt tatropapattiḥ.
T06sambhu:721: na ceha tatra vā samāpannayoḥ sukhaviśeṣo vidyate;
T06sambhu:726: H 73a5; C 336b12 (4.1.1.1.0) aṣṭau vimokṣā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīty evamādayaḥ pūrvavat.
T06sambhu:729: H73a5; C 336b15 (4.1.1.1.1) kathaṃ rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati?
T06sambhu:730: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnoti, na ca rūpavairāgyam.
T06sambhu:731: sa evaṃ muktaḥ, yebhyo muktaḥ, tāny eva kāmāvacarāṇi rūpāṇi manasikaroty adhimucyate sālokābhāsanimittena.
T06sambhu:733: yac ca kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ, yac ca lābhī rūpasamāpatteḥ, saprabhāsaṃ cādhimucyate.
T06sambhu:737: kāmāvacarāṇi rūpāṇi bhittvā yāny abhibhvāyataneṣu vibhāvitāni parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇītāni, evam adhimātrāṇi ceti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:739: vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāya prayogaparikarmārtham, tadyathābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanānām āryāyā ṛddher araṇāpraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidādīnāṃ ca.
T06sambhu:740: yady apy ayaṃ pūrvaṃ tebhyo rūpebhyo vītarāgaḥ, na tv anena teṣv adhimuktivaśitā labdheti tallābhārthaṃ punaḥ punar adhimucyate.
T06sambhu:741: H 73b1; C 336b28 (4.1.1.1.2) katham adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati?
T06sambhu:742: kāmadhātau jāto bhūto rūpavītarāga ārūpyasamāpattim asaṃmukhīkurvaṃs tatsaṃjñī cāvabhāsanimittam amanasikurvan bahirdhā rūpāṇy adhimucyate.
T06sambhu:745: yac cārūpyasamāpatter lābhī tāṃ ca samāpattim ātmanā saṃjānīte, yac cādhyātmam avabhāsanimittaṃ na manasikaroti.
T06sambhu:747: H 73b2; C 336c4 (4.1.1.1.3) kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharati?
T06sambhu:748: yathāpīhaikatyo lābhī bhavaty upekṣāsmṛteḥ pariśuddhāyāḥ paryavadātāyāḥ.
T06sambhu:749: tāṃ ca tena niśritya śubhā bhāvitā bhavaty āryākāraparipūrṇā.
T06sambhu:754: kāyena sākṣātkṛtveti tena vihāreṇāryā bahulaṃ viharanti.
T06sambhu:755: H 73b3; C 336c9 (4.1.1.1.4) ākāśānantyāyatanavimokṣo yathāpi tasmād vītarāga ākāśam evādhimucyate.
T06sambhu:756: evaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanavimokṣas tasmād vītarāgasya tad evādhimucyamānasya.
T06sambhu:760: H 73b4; C 336c17 (4.1.1.2.1) pūrvam adhimucya parikarma kṛtvā paścād abhibhūya paśyatīty abhibhvāyatanāni.
T06sambhu:762: hīnābhibhavo yathā kenacid utkarṣāt tena śilpādinā paraṃ hīnatāyāṃ sthāpayati.
T06sambhu:764: antardhāpanābhibhavas tadyathā tiraskaroti kuṇḍādinā, mantrair vāntardhāpayaty ṛddhyā vā.
T06sambhu:766: vaśavartanābhibhavas tadyathā yathākāmakāraṇārthena svāmī dāsam avasthāpayati.
T06sambhu:767: asmiṃs tv arthe ’ntardhāpanābhibhavaś ca vaśavartanābhibhavaś cābhipretaḥ.
T06sambhu:769: H 73b6; C 336c27 (4.1.1.2.2) tatra rūpāṇi paśyati parīttānīti sattvopakaraṇākhyāni.
T06sambhu:775: teṣāṃ punaś caturvidho varṇaḥ sattvānām upakaraṇānāṃ vimānānāṃ ca.
T06sambhu:778: H 74a1; C 337a6 (4.1.1.3.1) kṛtsnāyatanair adhimokṣasya vastunaḥ kṛtsnam āyatanam adhimucyate.
T06sambhu:781: H 74a1; C 337a8 (4.1.1.3.2) kena kāraṇena rūpaspraṣṭavyābhyām āyatanābhyām etad vyavasthāpitam?
T06sambhu:782: anayoḥ svaparasaṃtānayoḥ sarvatra ca rūpiṇi dhātau saṃbhavāt.
T06sambhu:783: cakṣurādīni svāsaṃtānikāny eva, gandharasāv api na sarvagatau.
T06sambhu:788: H 74a2; C 337a15 (4.1.1.4.1) pūrvaṃ tāvad yogy adhimucyate, tato ’bhibhavati.
T06sambhu:789: tato ’bhibhavavaśitāṃ labdhvā paścāt tad eva kṛtsnam āyatanaṃ yathākāmam adhimucyate.
T06sambhu:791: H 74a2; C 337a18 (4.1.1.4.2) aṣṭābhī rūpakṛtsnaiḥ pariśuddhair āryām ādhimokṣikīṃ vastupariṇāmikīṃ ca rddhim abhinirharati.
T06sambhu:792: sa yathādhimucyate yāvat pariṇāmayati, tathaiva tad bhavati;
T06sambhu:793: śakyaṃ ca tena kāryaṃ kartuṃ suvarṇādinā.
T06sambhu:795: ākāśakṛtsnena pariśuddhena yad icchati tad ākāśaṃ karoti.
T06sambhu:796: H 74a3; C 337a23 (4.1.1.4.3) tadyathā kumbhakārāyaskārasuvarṇakārā mṛttikādīni tatprathamataḥ samāyojayanti, no tu tāni suparikarmīkṛtāni bhavanti, evaṃ vimokṣāvasthā.
T06sambhu:798: yathā suparikarmīkṛtya yatheṣṭaṃ pariṇāmayanti, evaṃ kṛtsnāyatanāvasthā draṣṭavyā.
T06sambhu:802: yā niḥsattvajīvapoṣapudgalatām ārabhya cittasya sthitir aikāgryam.
T06sambhu:804: parīkṣāśūnyatā tadyathā sarvadharmāñ śūnyān pratyavekṣate nityena yāvad ātmanātmīyeneti.
T06sambhu:805: tatphalaśūnyatā tadyathā śūnyākopyā cetovimuktī rāgādibhiḥ sarvakleśaiḥ.
T06sambhu:807: bahirdhāśūnyatā tadyathā śūnyāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ kāmarāgeṇa.
T06sambhu:808: yathoktaṃ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharāmīti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:812: kadācid yogī bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ manasikaroti kadācid adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ tatphalaśūnyatayā, kadācid adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ parīkṣāśūnyatayā, tadvaśena hi tayoś cittaṃ praskandati.
T06sambhu:813: saced adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyām api na praskandati, tata ānijyaṃ manasikaroti.
T06sambhu:815: tathāsya manasikurvata asmītīñjitaṃ na bhavati, ayam aham asmīti vistareṇa cittam asya neñjate.
T06sambhu:818: pañcopādānaskandhān anityato vā duḥkhato vā manasikurvato yā cittasya sthitir aikāgryam.
T06sambhu:820: teṣām evopādānaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ śāntato manasikurvato yā cittasya sthitir aikāgryam.
T06sambhu:821: H 74b1; C 337b18 (4.1.2.1.3.2) yad uktam ānimittaś cetaḥsamādhir no cāvanata iti vistareṇa.
T06sambhu:825: sarvanimittānāṃ cāmanasikārād ānimittasya ca dhātor manasikārāt.
T06sambhu:826: tatra nimittāny amanasikurvaṃs teṣu na nirvidyate na vidūṣayati kevalam anabhisaṃskāram eva karoti.
T06sambhu:828: animittaṃ ca dhātuṃ manasikurvaṃs tatra na sajjate.
T06sambhu:835: tathā hi tasya nimittānusāri vijñānam antarāntarā cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati.
T06sambhu:836: tat punaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya sthāpyamānaṃ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti, nimittānusārād vimucyate.
T06sambhu:837: tac ca vimuktaṃ vimuktatvān na pratisaṃkhyāya sthitaṃ bhavatīty ataḥ suvimuktam.
T06sambhu:838: pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya sthāpyamānaṃ punaḥ sthitatvād vimuktaṃ bhavati, no tu suvimuktam.
T06sambhu:842: punaḥ satyābhisamayo ’py ājñā, arhattvam apy ājñā.
T06sambhu:844: H 74b5; C 337c7 (4.1.2.1.4) yad yatra nāsti, tat tena śūnyam iti darśanāc chūnyatā.
T06sambhu:845: yad evaṃ paśyati, tatraiva na praṇidadhātīty apraṇihitaḥ.
T06sambhu:847: H 74b5; C 337c10 (4.1.2.1.5) kasmāt punar iha śūnyatāṃ pūrvam āha, anyatra yad anityaṃ tad duḥkham, yad duḥkhaṃ tad anātmeti paścāc chūnyatām
T06sambhu:848: na tāvad anityaduḥkhadarśanaṃ tathā pariśudhyate, yenāpraṇidhānaṃ bhavati, yāvad anātmasaṃjñā na saṃtiṣṭhate.
T06sambhu:850: ata evoktam anityasaṃjñino hy anātmasaṃjñā saṃtiṣṭhata iti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:851: sa tad anityam anātma dṛṣṭvā na praṇidadhāti;
T06sambhu:852: animittam eva praṇidadhāti niḥsaraṇaṃ samanveṣamāṇa ity anantaram animittam ucyate.
T06sambhu:853: H 74b7; C 337c17 (4.1.2.2.1) savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ?
T06sambhu:855: H 74b7; C 337c18 (4.1.2.2.2) avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ?
T06sambhu:856: yo vicāramātrasaṃprayuktaḥ, yaṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmatvaṃ pratilabhate.
T06sambhu:858: yo vitarkavicāraviprayuktaḥ, yaṃ bhāvayitvā tadūrdhvaṃ yāvad bhavāgrād upapadyate ’nyatrānāsravebhyaḥ samādhibhyaḥ.
T06sambhu:860: vitarkavicārebhyaś cittam adhyupekṣya saced ekarasenādhyātmam ālambanam adhimucyata ekarasena ca saṃprakhyāyate.
T06sambhu:862: ālambanato vā parīttaḥ parīttakaviṣayarūpadarśanāt, manasikārato vā parīttaśraddhācchandādhimokṣatvāt.
T06sambhu:864: ālambanato vā mahadgataḥ prabhūtarūpadarśanāt, na tv anantadarśanāt;
T06sambhu:865: manasikārato vā mahadgato ’dhimātraśraddhācchandādhimokṣatvāt, na tv anantāparyantaśraddhācchandādhimokṣatvāt.
T06sambhu:869: H 75a3; C 338a3 (4.1.2.3.2) tatra mahadgataś cetaḥsamādhir ābhā devā ābhā devā ity ekaṃ vṛkṣamūlam adhimucyata iti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:871: H 75a4; C 338a5 (4.1.2.3.3.1) ābhā devā ābhā devā iti katham ekaṃ vṛkṣamūlam adhimucyate?
T06sambhu:872: kāmadhātuṃ dūṣayitvā prathamadhyānalābhī tatsamāpattipariśodhanārthaṃ prayukto bhavati;
T06sambhu:873: śrutāś cānena bhavanty ābhā devā iti.
T06sambhu:874: sa teṣām evātmabhāvālokanimittaṃ manasikurvann ekaṃ vṛkṣamūlam adhimucyate yāvat samudraparyantāṃ pṛthivīm, samādher uttarottarādhimātratvāt.
T06sambhu:877: yo yāvad adhimucyate, tasya tāvan manaskāraḥ prajñapyate.
T06sambhu:879: tasyaiva manasikārasya vaśena tasya samādher bhāvanāviśeṣaḥ prajñapyate pariśuddhataratamabhāvāt.
T06sambhu:881: yathā yathāsubhāvitataraḥ samādhir bhavati, tathā tathopapattihetuviśeṣaḥ prajñapyate.
T06sambhu:883: tena hetunā tatropapannānāṃ sattvānām uccanīcatā hīnapraṇītatā ca prajñapyate.
T06sambhu:884: H 75a6; C 338a18 (4.1.2.3.3.3) kaḥ prathamadvitīyayor dhyānayor ābhāviśeṣaḥ?
T06sambhu:885: tadyathā maṇer bahir ābhā bhavati, maṇis tu nābhā, evaṃ prathame dhyāne śarīrād bahir ābhā, na śarīrāṇy eva.
T06sambhu:886: yathā tu pradīpasya bahir ābhā, sa ca pradīpa ābhāsaḥ, evaṃ dvitīye dhyāne śarīram apy ābhā veditavyā.
T06sambhu:888: H 75b1; C 338a25 (4.1.2.3.4.1) kathaṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
T06sambhu:891: te yathākramaṃ sukhakāmā duḥkhaviyogakāmāḥ sukhāviyogakāmāś ca.
T06sambhu:893: yathākramaṃ sukhopasaṃhārato duḥkhāpanayanopasaṃhārataḥ sukhāviyogānumodanopasaṃhārataś ca trayāṇām.
T06sambhu:894: upekṣā punas teṣām eva trayāṇāṃ sukhādikāmānām aratyutkaṇṭhāsaṃkliṣṭatopasaṃhārato dveṣāsaṃkliṣṭatopasaṃhārato rāgāsaṃkliṣṭatopasaṃhārataś ca
T06sambhu:912: H 75b4; C 338b15 (4.1.2.3.4.3.0) yad uktaṃ maitrī bhāvitā śubhaparamā bhavatīti vistaraḥ, kiṃ saṃdhāyoktam?
T06sambhu:913: H 75b4; C 338b16 (4.1.2.3.4.3.1) etad agraṃ sukhānām, yaduta tṛtīye dhyāne.
T06sambhu:916: H 75b5; C 338b18 (4.1.2.3.4.3.2) karuṇāpy ākāśānantyāyatanopasaṃhāraparibhāvitā paramā bhavati.
T06sambhu:918: ata ārūpyeṣv etat sarvaśo nāstīti nāsti cchedanabhedanādiduḥkham ity ākāśānantyāyatanam eṣām upasaṃharati karuṇāsamāpanno duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānām:
T06sambhu:919: „yatra sāśrayaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti, tathaite bhavantu“ iti.
T06sambhu:920: H 75b5; C 338b23 (4.1.2.3.4.3.3) muditāsamāpannaḥ punaḥ sukhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ modaprāptānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃharati:
T06sambhu:921: „evam apramāṇaṃ sukham eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavatu yāvad apramāṇaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam“ iti;
T06sambhu:925: ataḥ „yathārhato bhikṣoḥ sarveṣu sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhapracāreṣv asaṃkleśo bhavati, evam eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavatu“ ity upekṣāsamāpannas tad ākiṃcanyāyatanam
T06sambhu:927: H 75b7; C 338c2 (4.1.2.3.4.3.5) etāni ca sarvāṇy āryākārāṇy ārya eva bhāvayituṃ śaknoti bodhyaṅgasahagatāni.
T06sambhu:929: yatrāvabhāsanimittaṃ vaiva rūpanimittam eva vā manasikṛtya samāpadyate.
T06sambhu:930: tābhyāṃ yathākramam avabhāsaṃ vā saṃjānīte rūpāṇi vā paśyati.
T06sambhu:933: so ’vabhāsaṃ ca saṃjānīte rūpāṇi ca paśyati.
T06sambhu:934: H 76a1; C 338c9 (4.1.2.4.2.1) evam ālokaparibhāvitasya samādher ekādaśāntarāyā veditavyā vicikitsādayo yathāsūtram eva vistareṇa.
T06sambhu:936: samādhinimittasya dvividhasyāpy ālambananimittasya nidānanimittasya ca, yad āśritaḥ samādhis tiṣṭhati.
T06sambhu:940: yathā vā rūpāṇy adraṣṭukāmo ’kṣiṇī vā nimīlayaty anyato vā mukhaṃ parivartayati, evam ayaṃ teṣu rūpeṣv amanasikāram āpadyate.
T06sambhu:942: H 76a3; C 338c18 (4.1.2.4.2.2.4) atiprajāgarād atisvapnāsevanāj jāḍyaṃ styānamiddham.
T06sambhu:943: H 76a3; C 338c18 (4.1.2.4.2.2.5) rūpāṇy apaśyato ’paripūrṇaṃ vā paśyatas tadubhayārtham atyābhogaṃ karoty atyavaṣṭabdhaṃ manasikāraṃ karoti;
T06sambhu:945: H 76a3; C 338c20 (4.1.2.4.2.2.6) atyārambhadoṣāt punar atilīnaṃ karoti laṭukikāśakunipīḍanavat.
T06sambhu:946: H 76a4; C 338c22 (4.1.2.4.2.2.7) tasyāvabhāsamātraṃ prārthayamānasya sa rūpadarśanena sahotpanna ity ekam icchato dvayalābhān nidhimukhadvayalābhavad
T06sambhu:947: H 76a4; C 338c24 (4.1.2.4.2.2.8) sarvadikṣu sahasā saumyarūpasaṃdarśanād yugapac chambitatvam ubhayapārśvavartakotpatanavat.
T06sambhu:948: H 76a4; C 338c25 (4.1.2.4.2.2.9) tasya carato vā viharato vā lokacitrikeṣu nānātvasaṃjñā bhavati.
T06sambhu:950: tena vā punaḥ samādhinātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ paśyan paraṃ ca hīnam ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇāti;
T06sambhu:952: H 76a5; C 338c29 (4.1.2.4.2.2.10) atyarthaṃ bhāṣyaprayuktasyāticiraṃ vā vitarkayataḥ kāyaḥ klāmyati yāvac cittaṃ na samādhīyata ity ato ’tyabhijalpo
T06sambhu:953: H 76a5; C 339a1 (4.1.2.4.2.2.11) tadutpanne ’vabhāsanimitte rūpadarśane vādhyātmaṃ yogavihāraṃ manaskāram utsṛjya bahirdhā praṇidadhāti, rūpāṇy upanidhyātum ārabhata ity etad atinidhyāyitatvaṃ samādher antarāyaḥ.
T06sambhu:954: H 76a6; C 339a4 (4.1.2.4.2.3) ete yathāyogaṃ samādher ālambanāntarāyā veditavyā nidānāntarāyāś ca, yathākramam ālambananidānanimittābhyāṃ cyāvanāt.
T06sambhu:962: H 76a7; C 339a11 (4.1.2.6.1) katamā samādhibhāvanā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate?
T06sambhu:963: caturṇāṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāṇāṃ prayogamārge yā samādhibhāvanā, mauleṣu cāpariśuddhāparyavadāteṣu yā samādhibhāvanā.
T06sambhu:964: apūrvasamāpattyarthaṃ tu bhagavatā prathamasya dhyānasya prayogamārga uktaḥ.
T06sambhu:965: H 76b1; C 339a14 (4.1.2.6.2) katamā samādhibhāvanā jñānadarśanapratilambhāya saṃvartate?
T06sambhu:966: iha bhikṣuṇālokanimittam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavatīti yathāsūtram.
T06sambhu:968: tatra yad divyena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇām ālocanaṃ pratyakṣībhāvaḥ, tad darśanam.
T06sambhu:969: yat punar jānīta ity api tā devatā evaṃnāmāna evaṃjātyā iti vistareṇādhidevatāsūtram, idaṃ jñānam.
T06sambhu:970: H 76b2; C 339a19 (4.1.2.6.3) katamā samādhibhāvanā prajñāprabhedāya saṃvartate?
T06sambhu:971: satyābhisamayasya srotaāpattiphalasya prayogamārge yā samādhibhāvanā pratisaṃvidāṃ ca.
T06sambhu:974: H 76b3; C 339a24 (4.1.2.7.0) āryaḥ pañcajñānikaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ?
T06sambhu:975: ayaṃ khalu me samādhir āryo nirāmiṣo niraupadhika iti vistareṇa yathāsūtram.
T06sambhu:976: pañcākāraṃ jñānam anena paridīpitam, tadyathā svabhāvataḥ pudgalataḥ pariśuddhitaḥ phalataḥ samādhivyutthānanimitteṣu ca jñānam.
T06sambhu:977: H 76b3; C 339a27 (4.1.2.7.1) tatrārya iti kuśalāryatayānāsravāryatayā ca.
T06sambhu:978: nirāmiṣa iti kuśalāryatāṃ jñāpayati, niraupadhika ity anāsravāryatām.
T06sambhu:979: H 76b4; C 339a28 (4.1.2.7.2) akāpuruṣasevita ity āryair buddhais tacchrāvakaiś ca.
T06sambhu:982: na yathā prathamaṃ dhyānam ūrdhvagamanābhiyogārthaṃ pūrvaṃ śāntataḥ praśasya punar audārikato vigarhyate paścād iti.
T06sambhu:989: H 76b6; C 339b10 (4.1.2.7.5) smṛta eva samāpatsya iti sūdgṛhītasya samādhinimittasyāsaṃpramoṣāt.
T06sambhu:990: smṛta eva vyutthāsya iti sūdgṛhītasya vyutthānanimittasyāsaṃpramoṣāt.
T06sambhu:992: H 76b7; C 339b13 (4.1.2.8.1.1) iha bhikṣur imam eva kāyaṃ vivekajena prītisukheneti prathamadhyānabhūmikena.
T06sambhu:994: parispharati prayoganiṣṭhe manaskāre, pariprīṇayati pūrveṣu manaskāreṣu;
T06sambhu:995: teṣv api hi prītisukham antarāntarotpadyate, na tu sthiraṃ bhavati, na paripūrṇam iti.
T06sambhu:996: nāsya kiṃcid aparisphuṭaṃ bhavati spharaṇīyam iti prayoganiṣṭhāphale manaskāre.
T06sambhu:998: tatra yathā dakṣaḥ snapako ’ntevāsī vā, evaṃ yogācāro draṣṭavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:999: kāṃsyāṃ vā sthāle vā śuktyāṃ veti kāmavivekajaṃ prītisukham ārabhyāvavādānuśāsanī draṣṭavyā.
T06sambhu:1009: tasyopari saṃkṣepo dvitīyaṃ dhyānam avitarkam ālambanaikarasādhimokṣāt.
T06sambhu:1017: tatra yathotpalādīni, evaṃ niṣprītikaṃ sukham tatsaṃprayuktāś ca dharmā āśrayaś ca.
T06sambhu:1025: sa hi nipuṇo bhavaty apramattajātīyaś cintakas tulaka upaparīkṣakaḥ, na cāsya kaścid avidito bhavaty āyo vā vyayo vā.
T06sambhu:1026: evaṃ pariśuddhacaturthadhyānalābhī nipuṇo bhavaty apramādagāmī sarvārthasaṃvijñāne paṭuḥ.
T06sambhu:1027: aṣṭotena vā navotena veti sāratvād daṃśamaśakādīnām agamyatāṃ darśayati.
T06sambhu:1028: saśiraḥpādaka iti dvābhyāṃ doṣābhyāṃ gamyaḥ syāt:
T06sambhu:1031: evam eva sa tena pariśuddhena cittena sphuṭaḥ sarveñjitānām agamyo bhavati;
T06sambhu:1032: kṣamo bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya yāvad dhakkārāṇāṃ pikkārāṇāṃ parato duruktānāṃ śārīrikāṇāṃ ca vedanānām.
T06sambhu:1034: pratyavekṣaṇānimittam eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ceti pūrvavyākhyātam eva veditavyam.
T06sambhu:1035: traiyadhvikāṃś ca saṃskārān pratyavekṣate, yena ca pratyavekṣate, tad api pratyavekṣata ity eṣa tatra piṇḍārthaḥ.
T06sambhu:1038: H 77b2; C 339c24 (4.1.2.8.2.2.1) yā caturṣu dhyāneṣv āryāṇāṃ cittaikāgratā pratyavekṣāvasthāyāṃ ca, ayam āryaḥ samādhiḥ.
T06sambhu:1042: H 77b3; C 339c29 (4.1.2.9.0) āryasamyaksamādhiḥ sopaniṣat sapariṣkāraḥ katamaḥ?
T06sambhu:1044: H 77b3; C 340a1 (4.1.2.9.2) tasya pañca mārgāṅgāny upaniṣat:
T06sambhu:1049: sapta mārgāṅgāny āryasya samyaksamādher upaniṣad apy ucyate, pariṣkārā apīti.
T06sambhu:1051: tatra pūrvaṃgamānupūrvārthena pañcānām upaniṣattvam, samādhipariṣkārārthena trayaḥ pariṣkārāḥ.
T06sambhu:1052: H 77b4; C 340a7 (4.1.2.9.3) kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiḥ pūrvaṃgamā bhavati?
T06sambhu:1053: santi loke ’rhantaḥ samyaggatā iti jñātvā naiṣkramye cchandam utpādayati.
T06sambhu:1056: tataḥ pravrajitaḥ śīlam ājīvaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
T06sambhu:1058: H 77b5; C 340a11 (4.1.2.9.4) tasya caiṣāṃ samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ vipakṣikā mithyādṛṣṭyādayaḥ pañcāprahīṇā bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1059: sa etān eva pañca kuśalān dharmān niśritya pratiṣṭhāya parato ghoṣānvayāc chrutamayīṃ samyagdṛṣṭim utpādayati tadvipakṣikadharmaprahāṇāya mārgasaṃbhārabhūtāṃ
T06sambhu:1062: sa tayā samyagdṛṣṭyā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ mithyādṛṣṭito yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti samyagdṛṣṭiṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭito yāvat samyagājīvaṃ parijñāya mithyādṛṣṭyādiprahāṇāyotsāhaṃ janayati samyagdṛṣṭyādyupasaṃpade ca.
T06sambhu:1064: yena ca tadvipakṣāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ tāṃ copasaṃpadaṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudānayati, sāsya bhavati samyaksmṛtiḥ.
T06sambhu:1065: sā ca smṛtiḥ samādhibhāga iti samādhir ity uktarūpo bhavati.
T06sambhu:1066: yad antarā ca mithyādṛṣṭyādīn prajahāti samyagdṛṣṭyādīn upasaṃpādayati, tad antarā prayogamārge mithyāvyāyāmasmṛtī api prajahāti samyagvyāyāmasmṛtī
T06sambhu:1067: H 78a1; C 340a24 (4.1.2.9.5) tatprahāṇopasaṃpatsamakālaṃ cāryaḥ samyaksamādhiḥ paripūrṇo bhavati.
T06sambhu:1068: H 78a1; C 340a26 (4.1.2.9.6) tatra pūrvaṃgamā prajñādhiśīle niyojayati.
T06sambhu:1069: yaś ca parato ghoṣānvayo yoniśomanaskāro yac cādhiśīlaṃ śikṣā, tad ubhayaṃ niśritya prayogamārge ’dhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣotpadyate.
T06sambhu:1071: yā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagvyāyāmaś ca, sādhiprajñaṃ śikṣā.
T06sambhu:1075: so ’gratvāc chreṣṭhatvāt sāratvād upakleśānabhibhavanīyatvāt kleśānabhibhavanīyatvāc ca vajropama ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:1076: tadyathā vajraṃ sāraṃ sarvamaṇīnām, na ca kenacid upalikhyate, sarvāṃś copalikhatīty etad atra sārūpyaṃ vajreṇa.
T06sambhu:1078: iha bhikṣur imam eva kāyam iti vistareṇa yathāsūtram.
T06sambhu:1080: bhāvanāheyaviṣkambhaṇapratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratyavekṣā cety etad etāsāṃ śarīraṃ samastaṃ veditavyam.
T06sambhu:1081: H 78a4; C 340b13 (4.1.3.1.2) tatra prathamayāśubhāprāyogikaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ niśrityāntaḥ kāyasyāśubhatāṃ pratyavekṣate kāmarāgasyāsamudācārāya.
T06sambhu:1082: dvitīyayā tad eva niśritya yāvadasthipuruṣapratyavekṣayā bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhatāṃ pratyavekṣate tasyaivāsamudācārāya.
T06sambhu:1085: pūrvikayāśubhayāntaḥ kāyasya sthitāṃ vartamānām aśubhatāṃ pratyavekṣate, paścimayā dharmatāṃ pratividhyati:
T06sambhu:1087: H 78a5; C 340b21 (4.1.3.1.3) vijñānasrotaḥ pratyavekṣata iti tasyodayavyayapratyavekṣaṇāt.
T06sambhu:1088: janmaparaṃparāpratisaṃdhitaś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate, kṣaṇaparaṃparāpratisaṃdhitaś ca sarāgaṃ vītarāgam ity evamādiprakāram.
T06sambhu:1089: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivasānām atyayāt teṣāṃ teṣāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrtānām anekavidhaṃ bahunānāprakāram anyad evotpadyate ’nyan nirudhyata iti pratyavekṣate.
T06sambhu:1090: H 78a6; C 340b26 (4.1.3.1.4) tatrāvītarāgaḥ śaikṣa ubhayalokapratiṣṭhitaṃ pratyavekṣate, vītarāgaḥ paralokata eva, arhan na kvacit.
T06sambhu:1093: H 78a7; C 340c1 (4.1.3.3.1) asaṃjñāsamāpattiḥ śubhakṛtsnavītarāgasyopary avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ.
T06sambhu:1094: H 78b1; C 340c3 (4.1.3.3.2) tāṃ punaḥ kathaṃ samāpadyate?
T06sambhu:1095: „saṃjñā rogaḥ, saṃjñā gaṇḍaḥ, saṃjñā śalyaḥ“ iti caturthadhyānasamāpannaḥ saṃjñāvimukhaṃ manaskāraṃ bhāvayati, utpannotpannānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vaimukhyenāvatiṣṭhate.
T06sambhu:1096: „etac chāntam, etat praṇītam, yadutāsaṃjñikam“ ity āsaṃjñike cittaṃ pradadhāti.
T06sambhu:1098: H 78b1; C 340c7 (4.1.3.3.3) iha copapannaḥ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
T06sambhu:1100: saṃjñotpādāc caiṣāṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyutir bhavati.
T06sambhu:1102: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ.
T06sambhu:1103: H 78b2; C 340c10 (4.1.3.4.2) tāṃ punaḥ kathaṃ samāpadyate?
T06sambhu:1104: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāga āryo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānimittasamāpanno vā nirodhānimittasamāpanno vā.
T06sambhu:1105: tatra naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpannasya tadūrdhvaṃ cittam adhyupekṣamāṇasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanoccalitam ālambanasaṃniruddhaṃ cittaṃ
T06sambhu:1107: H 78b3; C 340c16 (4.1.3.4.3.1) nirodhaṃ samāpadyamānasya dvau dharmau bahukarau bhavataḥ:
T06sambhu:1115: H 78b4; C 340c22 (4.1.3.4.3.2) nirodhaṃ samāpadyamānasya katham anupūrveṇa trayaḥ saṃskārā nirudhyante?
T06sambhu:1118: tatra cāre vartamānaḥ kathām api karoti.
T06sambhu:1120: yadā tu vihāram ārabhate, tadā teṣāṃ dvitīyād dhyānāt prabhṛty anupūrvasamāpatter anupūrvanirodhaḥ.
T06sambhu:1122: H 78b5; C 340c27 (4.1.3.4.3.3) nirodhaṃ samāpannasya cittacaitasikā niruddhā bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1124: tasya hi rūpiṣv indriyeṣv apariṇateṣu pravṛttivijñānabījaparigṛhītam ālayavijñānam anuparataṃ bhavaty āyatyāṃ tadutpattidharmatāyai.
T06sambhu:1125: H 78b5; C 341a1 (4.1.3.4.3.4) kathaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpadyamānasya naivaṃ bhavati:
T06sambhu:1127: samāpattikāle nirabhisaṃskāreṇa cittanirodhāt, vyutthānakāle pūrvaniruddhatvāc cittasya.
T06sambhu:1128: kathaṃ pūrvam anena tac cittaṃ pariṣkṛtaṃ bhavati?
T06sambhu:1129: tena yair ākāraliṅganimittais tatra samāpattir vyutthānaṃ cāsevitaṃ bhavati bahulīkṛtam, teṣāṃ bhāvitatvāt svarasena samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate
T06sambhu:1130: H 78b7; C 341a7 (4.1.3.4.3.5) kathaṃ nirodhād vyutthitas trīn sparśān spṛśati:
T06sambhu:1132: yadbhūyasā tasyāḥ samāpatter vyuttiṣṭhamānas trividhenālambanena vyuttiṣṭhate:
T06sambhu:1134: taiś ca vyuttiṣṭhamāno yathākramam eva trīn sparśān spṛśati.
T06sambhu:1135: tatra bhavālambanena vyuttiṣṭhamānasya na bhavati cetasa iñjitatvam:
T06sambhu:1136: asmīty ayam aham asmīti vā bhaviṣyāmīti veti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:1138: viṣayālambanena vyuttiṣṭhamānasya na rāgakiṃcanaṃ bhavati, na dveṣakiṃcanaṃ bhavati, na mohakiṃcanam.
T06sambhu:1140: nirodhālambanena vyuttiṣṭhamānaḥ sarvanimittānām amanasikārād animittaṃ dhātum ālambate.
T06sambhu:1143: H 79a2; C 341a24 (4.2.1) yad uktaṃ bhagavatā pratisaṃlayanāya bhikṣavo yogam āpadyadhvam adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathāyeti, tatra yad viviktāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasaty araṇyagato vā yāvan niṣīdati vistareṇa pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya, idaṃ pratisaṃlayanam;
T06sambhu:1147: tatra pratisaṃlayanam adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamatham āvahati, adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathaḥ punar vipaśyanām.
T06sambhu:1149: H 79a3; C 341b7 (4.2.2.1) yad uktaṃ bhagavatā samādhiṃ bhikṣavo bhāvayata, apramāṇam, nipakāḥ pratismṛtā iti, tatra samādhiṃ bhāvayatety uddeśaṃ kṛtvā tasya triprakārabhāvanāṃ darśayati.
T06sambhu:1151: nipakā iti nityakāritā nipuṇakāritā ca naipakyam ity ucyate.
T06sambhu:1156: tatrāpramāṇabhāvanā laukikīm āvahati, pratismṛtatā lokottarām, naipakyaṃ punar ubhayoḥ kṣiprābhijñatām;
T06sambhu:1159: punar apramāṇam iti śamathamārgaṃ paridīpayati, pratismṛtā iti vipaśyanāmārgam, nipakā iti tayoḥ kṣiprasamudāgamamārgam.
T06sambhu:1160: punaḥ puṇyagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ nirvāṇagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ tayoś ca kṣiprasaṃpattigāminīṃ pratipadaṃ paridīpayati.
T06sambhu:1161: pūrvaṃ śamathe kṛtaparijayasyottarakālaṃ vipaśyanāsahagataṃ samādhiṃ bhāvayato yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ saṃkhyāyate.
T06sambhu:1163: asti dhyāyī samādhikuśalo na samāpattikuśala iti vistareṇa sūtroddānagāthā.
T06sambhu:1169: daśānāṃ kṛtsnāyatanasamāpattīnāṃ kuśalo bhavati samāpattaye vyutthānāya vāsaṃjñāsamāpatteś ca, na tu trayāṇāṃ samādhīnām.
T06sambhu:1170: ubhayoḥ kuśalatvād ubhayakuśalaḥ, nobhayoḥ kuśalatvān nobhayakuśalaḥ.
T06sambhu:1171: evam etā yathoktāḥ samādhisamāpattayaḥ, yatra yo yujyate, tathā yojayitavyāḥ.
T06sambhu:1174: samādhiṃ nāmapadavyañjanaśo jānīte, no tu tāny ākāraliṅganimittāni tasyāḥ samāpatteḥ, yaiḥ samāpadanaṃ bhavati.
T06sambhu:1176: yathāpīhaikatya ekatyasya samādher ākāraliṅganimittāni jānīte, yaiḥ samāpadyate, tathā samāpannaś ca taṃ samādhiṃ nāmapadavyañjanaśo na jānīte:
T06sambhu:1178: santi ca tāni samādhiśatāni sahasrāṇi ca, yāni bodhisattvaḥ samāpadyate, na ca teṣāṃ nāmapadavyañjanakāyāñ jānīte:
T06sambhu:1179: „imaṃ cemaṃ cāhaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ“ iti, yāvan na buddhāt paramapāramiprāptebhyo vā bodhisattvebhyaḥ śṛṇoti svayaṃ vā pāramiprāpto bhavati.
T06sambhu:1181: yair ākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyate, tāni sūdgṛhītāni bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1182: teṣāṃ sūdgṛhītatvād yāvad ākāṅkṣati tāvat samāpannas tiṣṭhati, na ca tasmāt samādheḥ parihīyate.
T06sambhu:1183: iti yaḥ samāpannasya vihāraḥ, yā cāparihāṇiḥ, iyaṃ dvividhā sthitiḥ.
T06sambhu:1185: yathāpīhaikatyo yair ākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyate, tāny amanasikṛtyāsamāhitabhūmikaṃ vikalpaśarīrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ samāhitabhūmivisabhāgaṃ dharmaṃ
T06sambhu:1186: H 79b5; C 341c21 (4.2.3.3.2.1) sa tasmāt samādher vyuttiṣṭhata itikaraṇīyahetor vāvaśyakaraṇīyahetor vābhyupagamakaraṇīyahetor vā.
T06sambhu:1191: H 79b6; C 341c25 (4.2.3.3.2.2) samāpattyantaraṃ vā punaḥ samāpattukāmo bhavati, tato vyuttiṣṭhate.
T06sambhu:1193: yathālambanam ākārayan samāpadyata audārikaśāntarogagaṇḍaśalyānityādyākārā iti tatra tatra samādhau ya ākārāḥ.
T06sambhu:1195: yadāsannasamāpanno bhavati samāpatteḥ, tadā tasya samāpattiliṅgāny utpadyante, yair asau jānāti:
T06sambhu:1196: „na cirād aham evaṃrūpāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ ca samāpattiṃ samāpatsye vā samāpadye vā“ iti.
T06sambhu:1197: yo ’py asyācāryo bhavati, so ’pi tair jānāti:
T06sambhu:1198: „na cirād ayam evaṃrūpāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ ca samāpattiṃ samāpatsyate“ iti.
T06sambhu:1202: H 79b7; C 342a5 (4.2.3.4.3.2.1) tatrālambananimittaṃ vikalpaśarīram, yenālambanena samāpadyate.
T06sambhu:1203: H 80a1; C 342a6 (4.2.3.4.3.2.2) nidānanimittaṃ yena samādhisaṃbhāreṇa samāpadyate, tadyathānulomika upadeśaḥ, samādhisaṃbhāropacayaḥ, bhāvanāsahagataś chandaḥ, saṃvignacittatā, vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānam, parataś cāsaṃghaṭṭo manuṣyād vāmanuṣyād vā śabdakṛto vā vyāpārakṛto vā.
T06sambhu:1205: saced asya samādhiḥ saṃskārābhinigṛhīto bhavati vārivad dhṛto na dharmatābhinigṛhīto na śānto na praṇīto na pratiprasrabdhalabdhamārgo na cetasa ekotībhāvādhigataḥ, nāsya samādhiḥ kalyo bhavati yathāsukhavihārāya.
T06sambhu:1208: praṇidhānasahagatayā cetanayā bahirdhā cittaṃ nigṛhya tasmin samādhau samavadadhāti;
T06sambhu:1209: sa cāsya manaskāras tathābhūtasya sābhogavāhano bhavati.
T06sambhu:1210: yathā bahirdhā prasaraṃ na dadāti, evaṃ vārivad dhṛto bhavati.
T06sambhu:1212: adhastād audārikadharmatā dṛṣṭā bhavati, upariṣṭāc chāntadharmatā.
T06sambhu:1213: śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ pratiprasrabdhalabdhamārgaś cetasa ekotībhāvādhigato yathāryaḥ pañcajñānikaḥ samādhiḥ.
T06sambhu:1215: yaḥ samādher viṣayaḥ, yasmāt pareṇa samāpanno na jānīte, tadyathā prathamadhyānasamāpanno dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ na paśyati.
T06sambhu:1220: tadyathā hryapatrāpyaṃ premagauravaṃ śraddhā yoniśomanaskāraḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyam indriyasaṃvaraḥ śīlasaṃvaro ’vipratisārādayaś ca yāvat sukhaparyavasānāḥ;
T06sambhu:1223: H 80a5; C 342a28 (4.2.3.8.3) sāṃpreyāsāṃpreyaṃ yathāpi tad eṣāṃ hryapatrāpyādīnāṃ kenacit samanvāgato bhavati kenacid asamanvāgataḥ:
T06sambhu:1224: hrīmān bhavaty apatrāpī, no tu premagauraveṇa yukta iti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:1231: H 80a6; C 342b4 (4.2.3.10) śamathaḥ pragraha upekṣā yathā śamathādinimitteṣūktās tathaiva veditavyāḥ.
T06sambhu:1232: H 80a6; C 342b5 (4.2.4.0) asti dhyāyī saṃpattim eva samānāṃ vipattiṃ pratyeti vistareṇa catuṣparivartadhyāyivibhaṅgasūtram.
T06sambhu:1235: tatra hānigāmī mārgo hāniś ca vipattiḥ;
T06sambhu:1238: „hīyate me vivekajaṃ prītisukham, parihīyate me samādhiḥ“ iti?
T06sambhu:1239: iha dhyāyino bhāvanānvayāt tac cittaṃ śāntapravaṇam.
T06sambhu:1242: sa tasyām avasthāyāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca prītisukhaṃ samatikrānto bhavati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ cāsaṃprāptaḥ.
T06sambhu:1246: tena dhyāyinā sa viparyāsas tatra parijñātavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:1247: H 80b1; C 342b16 (4.2.4.1.2) kathaṃ hīyamāne samādhau viparyāsaḥ parijñātavyaḥ?
T06sambhu:1248: ihaikatyo lābhī bhavati prathamadhyānasamāpatter nirvāṇam ārabhya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraś ca bhavati.
T06sambhu:1249: sa tāṃ nirvāṇe paripūrṇasaṃbhāratām āgamya tena hetunā tena pratyayena tadāvedhāt svarasena cāsyaivaṃrūpāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti, yaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikārair yat tatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvad vijñānagataṃ vā, tad asya rogataḥ khyāti yāvad anātmataḥ khyāti.
T06sambhu:1250: taṃ ca saṃjñāmanasikāram āgamyāsya tadanantaraṃ tal laukikasamāpattijaṃ prītisukhaṃ na samudācarati, yena tv asyaivaṃ bhavati:
T06sambhu:1253: evaṃ hi dhyāyinā hīyamāne samādhau viparyāsaḥ parijñātavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:1254: H 80b3; C 342b26 (4.2.4.1.3) kathaṃ hīyamāne samādhāv aviparyāsaḥ parijñātavyaḥ?
T06sambhu:1255: ihaikatyaḥ prathamadhyānasamāpattyā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati nottari vyāyacchate tāṃ cāsvādayati.
T06sambhu:1256: sa tasya bhavati kāmasahagataḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraḥ, kāmadhātor āsannasamāpanno yena parihīyate.
T06sambhu:1260: punas tayā dhyānasamāpattyātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃsayati:
T06sambhu:1261: „aham asmi lābhī dhyānasamāpatteḥ, anye na tathā“ iti.
T06sambhu:1263: yataś ca tatparyavasthānaṃ vivardhayati ghanīkaroti, sa tasmāt samādheḥ parihīyate.
T06sambhu:1267: tena cāsya pare saṃbhāvayanti rājāno vā rājamahāmātrā vā, te cainaṃ satkurvanti.
T06sambhu:1268: sa tasmāt samādher vyutthitas tatpratisaṃyuktam anuvitarkayati.
T06sambhu:1271: evaṃ hi dhyāyinā hīyamāne samādhāv aviparyāsaḥ parijñātavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:1272: H 80b6; C 342c9 (4.2.4.1.4) dvitīyaḥ punar aviparyāsaḥ prathamaviparyāsaviparyayeṇa veditavyaḥ.
T06sambhu:1273: H 80b6; C 342c9 (4.2.4.2) ta ete bhavanti viparyāsāviparyāsādhiṣṭhāne catvāraḥ parivartāḥ.
T06sambhu:1274: H 80b7; C 342c12 (4.2.5.0) caturvyavacāro dhyāyī caturbhir ākāraiḥ samādhiṃ vyavacārayati:
T06sambhu:1277: „ayaṃ hīnaḥ, ayaṃ śreyān, ayaṃ śreyastaraḥ, ayaṃ śreyastamaḥ“ iti yathākramam.
T06sambhu:1279: H 80b7; C 342c16 (4.2.5.1) ihāyaṃ dhyāyī prathamād dhyānād vyutthitas tad dhyānaṃ na tāvat samāpattukāmo bhavati.
T06sambhu:1280: sa tāny ākāraliṅganimittāni na manasikaroti, kāmasahagatāś ca saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti yathoktāḥ;
T06sambhu:1282: tasmin samaye dhyāyinā samādher hīnatā vyavacārayitavyā.
T06sambhu:1283: H 81a1; C 342c20 (4.2.5.2) punar aparaṃ dhyāyī vyutthitaḥ prathamadhyānānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ labhate.
T06sambhu:1284: sa ca ye prathamasya dhyānasyākārādayaḥ, teṣāṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ karoti, yathāsya pratilabdhasya dhyānasya sthitir bhavaty
T06sambhu:1287: „ayaṃ me samādhiḥ śreyān, tiṣṭhati me samādhiḥ, na hīyate, na viśeṣāya, na nirvedhāya paraiti“.
T06sambhu:1288: H 81a2; C 342c26 (4.2.5.3) punar aparaṃ dhyāyī vyutthito labhate dvitīyadhyānānulomāṃ dharmadeśanām.
T06sambhu:1289: tasya tāṃ śrutvā dvitīyadhyānasamāpattimārgasahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti.
T06sambhu:1291: „ayaṃ me samādhiḥ śreyastaraḥ, na hānāya, na sthitaye, api tu viśeṣāya, na nirvedhāya paraiti“ iti.
T06sambhu:1292: H 81a3; C 343a2 (4.2.5.4) punar ayaṃ vyutthito duḥkhādisatyapratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti.
T06sambhu:1293: tasya tāṃ śrutvā duḥkhādisatyasahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti nirvedhabhāgīyāḥ.
T06sambhu:1295: „ayaṃ me samādhiḥ śreyastamaḥ, na hānāya, na sthitaye, na viśeṣāya, api tu nirvedhāya paraiti“.
T06sambhu:1297: cakṣuś ca bhavati rūpāṇi ca yāvan manaś ca dharmāś ca, atha ca punar bhikṣur imān dharmān sataḥ saṃvidyamānān na pratisaṃvedayati.
T06sambhu:1298: saṃjñī tāvan na pratisaṃvedayate, prāg evāsaṃjñīti.
T06sambhu:1301: iha bhikṣuḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
T06sambhu:1302: tena ca cakṣur yāvad dharmā vidūṣaṇābhibhavenābhibhūtā bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1303: sa na cakṣuṣi cakṣuḥsaṃjñī bhavati, saṃjñī ca bhavati, yāvan na dharmeṣu dharmasaṃjñī bhavati, saṃjñī ca bhavati.
T06sambhu:1305: cakṣurādīni duḥkhato manasikaroti samudayato vā rogādito vā.
T06sambhu:1306: sa tān dharmān svalakṣaṇena na pratisaṃvedayate.
T06sambhu:1311: yā sarvanimittāpagatā saṃjñā, saivātrāsaṃjñābhipretā, yā ca nirodhasamāpannasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃjñānām apravṛttiḥ.
T06sambhu:1313: H 81a6; C 343a20 (4.2.7.1.1) kathaṃ tathāniṣaṇṇo dharmān vicinoti pravicinoti?
T06sambhu:1314: iha bhikṣur lābhī bhavati prathamadhyānādīnām adṛṣṭasatyaś ca bhavati.
T06sambhu:1316: so ’bhiniṣīdann eva taṃ samādhiṃ niśritya duḥkhādisatyābhisamayaṃ karoti.
T06sambhu:1318: H 81a7; C 343a24 (4.2.7.1.2) punar aparaṃ duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yāvan mārgam;
T06sambhu:1321: sa tad evādhiprajñaṃ niśṛtyādhicitte yogaṃ karoti.
T06sambhu:1322: H 81b1; C 343a27 (4.2.7.1.3) tṛtīya ubhayor lābhī bhavati.
T06sambhu:1323: tasya śamathavipaśyane ubhe miśrībhūte samayugaṃ vartete.
T06sambhu:1324: H 81b2; C 343a28 (4.2.7.1.4) caturthaḥ pūrvam eva lābhī bhavati prathamadhyānādīnām;
T06sambhu:1325: na tv anena saddharmaśravaṇena kṛtaṃ bhavati na bāhuśrutyena.
T06sambhu:1326: sa śāstur antikād anyatamasya vā guror dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satyāni vādhikṛtyāvaśiṣṭasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ vā.
T06sambhu:1330: tathāniṣaṇṇaś ca tac cittaṃ sthāpayati dhyānasamāpattivihārataḥ.
T06sambhu:1331: H 81b2; C 343b5 (4.2.7.2) tatra prathamo mārgoddeśo darśanamārgābhinirhāram ārabhya, dvitīyatṛtīyo bhāvanāmārgābhinirhāram ārabhya, caturtha ubhayābhinirhāram ārabhya.
T06sambhu:1332: H 81b3; C 343b7 (4.2.8.0) catvāri viśuddhipradhānāni viśuddhaye pradhānānīti kṛtvā.
T06sambhu:1335: yeṣāṃ śīlādīnāṃ pratilabdhādhigatābhinirhṛtānāṃ paripūriḥ, yaś cānugrahaḥ, iyaṃ viśuddhiḥ.
T06sambhu:1339: ihaikatyaḥ śīlavān viharati prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtaḥ, na tv ācāragocarasaṃpannaḥ, nāṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī.
T06sambhu:1341: yadā punaḥ sarvam etad bhavati, tadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati.
T06sambhu:1343: yāsya dīrghakālābhyāsād indriyair guptadvārasya viharato vistareṇa yāvat tasmiñ śīle tanmayatā tatprakṛtyavasthāyitā, ayam anugrahaḥ.
T06sambhu:1345: prayoganiṣṭhāphalaṃ yadi prāpnoti caturthe vā dhyāne, sā paripūriḥ.
T06sambhu:1349: na cāsya samādhiḥ saṃskārābhinigṛhīto bhavatīti vistaraḥ.
T06sambhu:1353: tayā duḥkhaṃ prajānāti yāvan mārgam, no tu yathābhūtam;
T06sambhu:1355: yadā tu yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, tadā paripūrṇā bhavati.
T06sambhu:1360: yā śaikṣeṇa jñānadarśanena rāgādibhyo vimuktiḥ, sāparipūrṇā.
T06sambhu:1363: yathāsya carato yathā viharatas tasmād dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārān na parihāṇir bhavati.
T06sambhu:1364: H 81b7; C 343c2 (4.2.9.0) cetoviśuddhipratipannakena bhikṣuṇā kālena kālaṃ pañca nimittāni manasikartavyānīti sūtram.
T06sambhu:1366: tasyākuśalāḥ kāmādivitarkāś ca jñātyādivitarkāś cāntarāyā bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1369: H 82a1; C 343c8 (4.2.9.1.2) dvitīyasya vitarkādīnavadarśanād asmṛtyamanasikārād vā.
T06sambhu:1372: H 82a1; C 343c11 (4.2.9.1.3) tṛtīyasya pudgalasya naiva sarveṇa sarvaṃ prathamato bhavaty asamudācāraḥ.
T06sambhu:1373: tena śanair vitarkasaṃskārasraṃsanaṃ kartavyaṃ yathaudārikapraśamanāt krameṇa viṣkambhaṇārtham.
T06sambhu:1374: tenāpy aśaknuvan vitarkamārgeṣu vitarkālambaneṣu cittam udvejayaty uttrāsayati.
T06sambhu:1375: udvejya saṃvegasahagatena cittena tadbahulamanasikāratayā tad vitarkasahagataṃ cittaṃ saṃtāpayaty abhinigṛhṇāti.
T06sambhu:1376: H 82a2; C 343c15 (4.2.9.2) ta ete trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ pañcākārā bhavanti.
T06sambhu:1377: H 82a2; C 343c17 (4.2.10.0) yad uktaṃ bhagavatā pāṃsudhāvakasūtre jātarūpaviśuddhisādharmyeṇa cittaviśodhanam, tat kathaṃ draṣṭavyam?
T06sambhu:1380: H 82a3; C 343c20 (4.2.10.1.2) tatropakleśaviśuddhir gotrasthasya jātarūpasyaudārikamadhyasūkṣmopakleśāpanayād yāvac chuddhā eva suvarṇasikatā avaśiṣṭā bhavantīti.
T06sambhu:1383: H 82a4; C 343c24 (4.2.10.2.1) tatra yathā jātarūpaṃ gotrastham, evaṃ gotrasthaś cetoviśuddhipratipannako draṣṭavyaḥ, yo bhavyaḥ parinirvāṇāyābhinirvide.
T06sambhu:1385: yata upādāya śraddhāṃ pratilabhate, yayā niṣkrāmati.
T06sambhu:1386: H 82a5; C 343c27 (4.2.10.2.2.0) tasyāgārikāvasthāyāṃ naiṣkramyāvasthāyāṃ ca traya upakleśā bhavanti:
T06sambhu:1388: H 82a5; C 343c28 (4.2.10.2.2.1) tatra dvāv āgārikasya naiṣkramyavibandhaṃ kurvataḥ:
T06sambhu:1389: karmāntāś cākuśalāḥ, yat kāyavāgduścaritaṃ ratisthānīyam, dṛṣṭiś ca pāpikā:
T06sambhu:1393: H 82a6; C 344a2 (4.2.10.2.2.3) jñātyādivitarkā abhiratasya kuśaladharmabhāvanāsātatyāya vibandhāḥ.
T06sambhu:1394: teṣāṃ prahāṇāt kuśaladharmabhāvanāsātatyasaṃpādanāc chuddhaṃ cittaṃ bhavati savitarkaṃ savicāram, yathā śuddhāḥ suvarṇasikatā asaṃvartitāḥ.
T06sambhu:1396: H 82a6; C 344a6 (4.2.10.2.3) sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti, iyaṃ cittasya saṃgrahaviśuddhir avitarkāvicārasamādhisaṃgrahāt, jātarūpasyevāvartanasaṃvartanāt.
T06sambhu:1397: H 82a7; C 344a9 (4.2.10.2.4) sacet samādhir na saṃskārābhinigṛhīto bhavatīti vistareṇa, iyaṃ cittasya karmaṇyatāviśuddhir abhijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu yatheṣṭapariṇāmanāt, jātarūpasyeva prabhaṅguratādidoṣāpanayanāt.
T06sambhu:1398: H 82b1; C 344a13 (4.2.11) punas trīṇi nimittāni manasikartavyānīty uktam.
T06sambhu:1399: kālena kālaṃ śamathādīni, na tv ekāntena, layādipratipakṣārtham.
T06sambhu:1402: kālena kālam upekṣānimittam ity ayaṃ niṣpattimārgakālaḥ.
T06sambhu:1403: tasyāpy ekāṃśabhāvanāt pratītyasamutpādasatyapravicayākaraṇān na samyak cittaṃ samādhīyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya;
T06sambhu:1404: sa cānabhisamitāni satyāni nābhisameti, abhisamiteṣu vāsravakṣayaṃ na prāpnoti.
T06sambhu:1405: dvābhyāṃ samādhipariniṣpattimārgaḥ, tṛtīyena samādhiṃ niśrityāsravakṣayamārgaḥ samāsataḥ paridīpitaḥ kālena kālaṃ sarveṣāṃ manasikārāt.
T06sambhu:1406: H 82b3; C 344a25 (4.2.12.0) catvāro dharmāḥ śāsanasaṃgrahāya saṃvartante:
T06sambhu:1408: H 82b3; C 344a27 (4.2.12.1) tatra prāvivekyam araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi.
T06sambhu:1412: śamatha āsevito vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyata iti yathāpi tal lābhī bhavati prathamasya dhyānasya yāvac caturthasya.
T06sambhu:1413: sa taṃ samādhiṃ niśritya duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yāvan mārgam.
T06sambhu:1414: tasya tāṃ vipaśyanām āgamya darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ kleśebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate.
T06sambhu:1416: ihaikatyo duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yāvan mārgam.
T06sambhu:1418: tasya taṃ śamatham āgamya bhāvanāprahātavyebhyaḥ kleśebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate.
T06sambhu:1419: H 82b5; C 344b8 (4.2.12.3) evaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate.
T06sambhu:1425: śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ cārthenārthaḥ padena padaṃ vyañjanena vyañjanaṃ saṃsyandate sameti;
T06sambhu:1426: na tu yathānyatīrthikānāṃ nānānekabhinnamatikatā prajñāyata iti.
T06sambhu:1428: yair evaikaḥ pṛṣṭo bhavati, yadi tair eva dvitīyaḥ pṛcchyeteti;
T06sambhu:1429: athaikaḥ skandhān ārabhya pṛṣṭaḥ syāt, dvitīyo ’nyad ārabhya pṛcchyeta, nāgrapadaiḥ saṃsyandate.
